 2266: econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2267:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2268:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2269:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2270:                             Addr;
 2271:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2272:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2273:                     end
 2274:            end,
 2275:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) end,
 2276:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2277:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2278: 
 2279: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) ->
 2280:     {OS, _}         = os:type(),
 2281:     IsSocketBackend = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2282:     CPayload        = craasa_mk_payload(),
 2283:     SPayload        = "Whatever",
 2284: 
 2285:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2286:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2287:     {Client1, Server1} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2288: 
 2289:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2290:     {ok, Sender1} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, default,
 2291:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2292:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2293:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2294: 
 2295:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2296:     ok = inet:setopts(Server1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2297:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2298:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2299:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2300:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2301: 
 2302:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2303:     craasa_verify(default, Client1, SPayload),
 2304: 
 2305:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2306:     craasa_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2307: 
 2308:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2309:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2310:     {Client2, Server2} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2311: 
 2312:     ?P("populate 2 (true)"),
 2313:     {ok, Sender2} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, true,
 2314:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2315:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2316:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2317: 
 2318:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2319:     ok = inet:setopts(Server2, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2320:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2321:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2322:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2323:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2324: 
 2325:     ?P("verify 2 (true)"),
 2326:     craasa_verify(true, Client2, SPayload),
 2327: 
 2328:     ?P("cleanup 2 (true)"),
 2329:     craasa_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2330: 
 2331:     ?P("done"),
 2332:     ok.
 2333: 
 2334: craasa_mk_payload() ->
 2335:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2336: 
 2337: craasa_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2338:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2339:     ?P("create listen socket (server) with active = false"),
 2340:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false},
 2341:                                      {recbuf, 4096},
 2342:                                      {ip,     Addr}]),
 2343:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2344:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2345:     Opts = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2346:               is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2347:            end,
 2348:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2349:                            [{ip, Addr}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++ Opts) of
 2350:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2351:                      CSock;
 2352:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2353:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2354:         end,
 2355:     ?P("create accept socket (server)"),
 2356:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2357:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2358:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2359:     {Client, S}.
 2360: 
 2361: craasa_populate(OS, _ISB, _EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2362:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2363:     ?P("send payload (~w bytes) from client to server", [byte_size(CPayload)]),
 2364:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2365:     ?P("verify client socket queue size"),
 2366:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2367: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2368: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2369: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2370:     end,
 2371:     ?P("[server] send something"),
 2372:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2373:     {ok, undefined};
 2374: craasa_populate(OS, ISB,
 2375: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2376:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2377:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2378:                       end,
 2379:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2380:                                 craasa_populate_sender(
 2381: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2382: 				     true                       -> 1
 2383: 				  end,
 2384: 				  Client,
 2385: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2386: 				  CPayload)
 2387:                         end),
 2388:     receive
 2389:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2390:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2391:     after 2000 ->
 2392:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2393:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2394:             {ok, Sender}
 2395:     end.
 2396: 
 2397: craasa_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2398:     ?P("[socket, ~w] send payload (expect failure ~p)",
 2399:        [N, ExpectedSendReason]), 
 2400:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2401:         {error, ExpectedSendReason} ->
 2402:             ?P("[socket, ~w] expected payload send failure", [N]), 
 2403:             exit(normal);
 2404:         {error, UnexpectedSendReason} ->
 2405:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send failure: "
 2406: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, UnexpectedSendReason]), 
 2407: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2408: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload);
 2409: 	ok ->
 2410:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send success", [N]), 
 2411: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2412: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload)
 2413:     end;
 2414: craasa_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2415:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2416: 
 2417: craasa_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2418:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2419:     craasa_cleanup(Sender).
 2420: 
 2421: craasa_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2422:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2423:     receive
 2424:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2425:             ok
 2426:     after 0 ->
 2427:             ok
 2428:     end;
 2429: craasa_cleanup(_) ->
 2430:     ok.
 2431: 
 2432: craasa_verify(default, Client, Payload) ->
 2433:     ?P("[verify-default] client await server data"),
 2434:     receive
 2435: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2436:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2437:                "client received expected server data - "
 2438:                "now await socket closed"),
 2439: 	    receive
 2440: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2441:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2442:                        "received client socket closed"),
 2443: 		    ok;
 2444: 		Other1 ->
 2445:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2446:                        "awaiting client socket closed - received upexpected: "
 2447:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2448: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2449: 	    end;
 2450: 
 2451:         {tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2452:             ?P("[verify-default] client awaiting socket data - unexpected close"),
 2453:             ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Client});
 2454: 
 2455: 	Other2 ->
 2456:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2457:                "awaiting client socket data - received upexpected: "
 2458:                "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2459: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other2})
 2460:     end;
 2461: craasa_verify(true, Client, Payload) ->
 2462:     ?P("[verify-true] client await server data"),
 2463:     receive
 2464: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2465:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2466:                "client received expected server data - now await socket error"),
 2467: 	    receive
 2468: 		{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2469:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2470:                        "client received expected socket error - "
 2471:                        "now await socket closed"),
 2472: 		    receive
 2473: 			{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2474:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2475:                                "client received expected socket closed"),
 2476: 			    ok;
 2477: 			Other1 ->
 2478:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2479:                                "client awaiting socket closed - "
 2480:                                "received upexpected: "
 2481:                                "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2482: 			    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2483: 		    end;
 2484: 		Other2 ->
 2485:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2486:                        "client awaiting socket error - received upexpected: "
 2487:                        "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2488: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2489: 	    end;
 2490: 
 2491:         {tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2492:             ?P("[verify-true] client awaiting socket data - unexpected close"),
 2493:             ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Client});
 2494: 
 2495: 	Other3 ->
 2496:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2497:                "client awaiting socket data - received upexpected: "
 2498:                "~n      ~p", [Other3]),
 2499:             ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other3})
 2500:     end.

 2505: econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2506:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2507:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2508:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2509:                             Addr;
 2510:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2511:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2512:                     end
 2513:            end,
 2514:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2515:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr)
 2516:            end,
 2517:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2518:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2519: 
 2520: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr) ->
 2521:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2522:     {Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload} = craasao_pre(Config, Addr),
 2523: 
 2524:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2525:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2526: 
 2527:     ?P("[ctrl] populate"),
 2528:     {ok, Sender} = craasao_populate(OS, ISB,
 2529: 				    Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload),
 2530: 
 2531:     ?P("[ctrl] set server socket option linger: {true, 0}"),
 2532:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2533:     ?P("[ctrl] close server socket"),
 2534:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 2535:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2536:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2537: 
 2538:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2539:     craasao_verify(Client, Sender),
 2540: 
 2541:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"),
 2542:     craasao_cleanup(Client),
 2543: 
 2544:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2545:     ok.
 2546: 
 2547: craasao_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2548:     ?P("[pre] create listen socket with active = false"),
 2549:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2550:                          [{active, false},
 2551:                           {recbuf, 4096},
 2552:                           {ip,     Addr}]),
 2553:     ?P("[pre] listen socket: "
 2554:        "~n      ~p", [L]),
 2555:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2556:     ?P("[pre] create connect socket (~w)", [Port]),
 2557:     Client     = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2558:                                [{active,          false},
 2559:                                 {sndbuf,          4096},
 2560:                                 {show_econnreset, true},
 2561:                                 {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2562:                      {ok, CSock} ->
 2563:                          ?P("[pre] connect socket created:"
 2564:                               "~n      ~p", [CSock]),
 2565:                          CSock;
 2566:                      {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2567:                          ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2568:                  end,
 2569:     ?P("[pre] create accept socket"),
 2570:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2571:     ?P("[pre] close listen socket"),
 2572:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2573:     {Client, Server, craasao_mk_payload(), "Whatever"}.
 2574: 
 2575: craasao_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2576:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2577:     ?P("[populate,inet] client send data when"
 2578:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2579:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2580:     ok      = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2581:     ?P("[populate,inet] verify client socket queue size"),
 2582:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2583: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2584: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2585: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2586:     end,
 2587:     ?P("[populate,inet] server send data"),
 2588:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2589:     ?P("[populate,inet] sleep some"),
 2590:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2591:     {ok, undefined};
 2592: craasao_populate(OS, ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2593:     ?P("[populate,socket] entry when"
 2594:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2595:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2596:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2597:                                 craasao_populate_sender(
 2598: 				  if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) -> 2;
 2599: 				     true                         -> 1
 2600: 				  end,
 2601: 				  Client, CPayload)
 2602:                         end),
 2603:     receive
 2604:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2605: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2606: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2607:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2608:     after 2000 ->
 2609:             ?P("[populate,socket] send something"),
 2610:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2611:             {ok, Sender}
 2612:     end.
 2613: 
 2614: craasao_populate_sender(N, Client, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2615:     ?P("[populate,sender,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]),
 2616:     ExpectedSendRes = econnreset,
 2617:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2618: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2619: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] expected (payload) send failure", [N]), 
 2620: 	    exit(normal);
 2621: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2622: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected (payload) send failure reason:"
 2623: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2624: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload);
 2625: 	ok ->
 2626: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected send success - "
 2627: 	       "expected failure with ~p", [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2628: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload)
 2629:     end;
 2630: craasao_populate_sender(_, _, _) ->
 2631:     exit(send_failure).
 2632: 
 2633: 
 2634: craasao_mk_payload() ->
 2635:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2636: 
 2637: craasao_verify(Client, Sender) ->
 2638:     ?P("[verify] begin with"
 2639:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2640:        "~n      Sender: ~p", [Client, Sender]),
 2641:     is_pid(Sender) andalso
 2642:         craasao_verify_sender(Sender),
 2643:     ?P("[verify] ensure no 'unexpected messages' received"),
 2644:     ok = receive Msg -> {unexpected_msg, Msg} after 0 -> ok end,
 2645:     ?P("[verify] set client socket option active: once"),
 2646:     inet:setopts(Client, [{sys_trace, true}]),
 2647:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2648:     ?P("[verify] expect client econnreset"),
 2649:     receive
 2650: 	{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2651:             ?P("[verify] received client econnreset -> "
 2652:                "expect client closed message"),
 2653: 	    receive
 2654: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2655:                     ?P("[verify] "
 2656:                        "received expected client closed message - done"),
 2657: 		    ok;
 2658: 		Other1 ->
 2659:                     ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message "
 2660:                          "(expected closed): "
 2661:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2662: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2663: 	    end;
 2664: 	Other2 ->
 2665:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message (expected error): "
 2666:                "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2667:                "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other2, craasao_flush()]),
 2668: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2669:     end.
 2670: 
 2671: craasao_flush() ->
 2672:     craasao_flush([]).
 2673: 
 2674: craasao_flush(Acc) ->
 2675:     erlang:yield(),
 2676:     receive Msg    -> craasao_flush([Msg|Acc])
 2677:     after     1000 -> lists:reverse(Acc)
 2678:     end.
 2679: 
 2680: craasao_verify_sender(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2681:     ?P("[verify sender] await termination"),
 2682:     receive
 2683:         {'EXIT', Sender, normal} ->
 2684: 	    ?P("[verify sender] expected normal termination received"),
 2685:             ok;
 2686:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2687:             ?P("[verify sender] unexpected termination: "
 2688:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2689: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_sender_termination, Sender, Reason})
 2690:     after infinity ->
 2691:             ok
 2692:     end;
 2693: craasao_verify_sender(_) ->
 2694:     ok.
 2695: 
 2696: craasao_cleanup(Client) ->
 2697:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)).
 2698: 
 2699: 
 2700: %% --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2701: 
 2702: econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2703:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2704:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2705:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2706:                             Addr;
 2707:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2708:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2709:                     end
 2710:            end,
 2711:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2712:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr)
 2713:            end,
 2714:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2715:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2716: 
 2717: do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 2718:     {OS, _}  = os:type(),
 2719:     ISB      = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2720:     CPayload = craasp_mk_payload(),
 2721:     SPayload = "Whatever",
 2722: 
 2723:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2724:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2725:     {Client1, Server1} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2726: 
 2727:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2728:     {ok, Sender1} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, default,
 2729:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2730: 
 2731:     ?P("close server socket (1)"),
 2732:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2733:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2734:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2735: 
 2736:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2737:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client1, default, SPayload),
 2738: 
 2739:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2740:     craasp_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2741: 
 2742:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2743:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2744:     {Client2, Server2} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2745: 
 2746:     ?P("populate 2 (default)"),
 2747:     {ok, Sender2} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, true,
 2748:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2749: 
 2750: 
 2751:     ?P("close server socket 2"),
 2752:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2753:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2754:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2755: 
 2756:     ?P("verify 2 (default)"),
 2757:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client2, true, SPayload),
 2758: 
 2759:     ?P("cleanup 2 (default)"),
 2760:     craasp_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2761: 
 2762:     ?P("done"),
 2763:     ok.
 2764: 
 2765: 
 2766: craasp_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2767:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2768:     ?P("create listen socket *** with option switched off (default)"),
 2769:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2770:                          [{active, false}, {recbuf, 4096}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2771:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2772:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2773:     COpts = [{active, false}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++
 2774:         if
 2775:             (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2776:             is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2777:         end,
 2778:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | COpts]) of
 2779:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2780:                      CSock;
 2781:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2782:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2783:         end,
 2784:     ?P("accept connection"),
 2785:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2786:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2787:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2788:     {Client, Server}.
 2789: 
 2790: craasp_mk_payload() ->
 2791:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2792: 
 2793: craasp_populate(OS, _ISB,
 2794: 		_EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2795:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2796:     ?P("[port,server] set linger: true:0"),
 2797:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2798:     ?P("[port,server] send some data to client"),
 2799:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2800:     ?P("[port,client] send some data to server"),
 2801:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2802:     ?P("[port,client] verify (port) queue-size"),
 2803:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2804: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2805: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2806: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2807:     end,
 2808:     {ok, undefined};
 2809: craasp_populate(OS, ISB,
 2810: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2811:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2812:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2813:                       end,
 2814:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2815:                                 craasp_populate_sender(
 2816: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2817: 				     true                       -> 1
 2818: 				  end,
 2819: 				  Client,
 2820: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2821: 				  CPayload)
 2822:                         end),
 2823:     receive
 2824: 	{'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2825: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2826: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2827: 	    {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2828:     after 2000 ->
 2829:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2830:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2831:             {ok, Sender}
 2832:     end.
 2833:     
 2834: craasp_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2835:     ?P("[socket,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]), 
 2836:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2837: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2838: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] payload send failure (as expected)", [N]), 
 2839: 	    exit(normal);
 2840: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2841: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected failure reason:"
 2842: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2843: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload);
 2844: 	ok ->
 2845: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected success - expected failure with ~p",
 2846:                [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2847: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload)
 2848:     end;
 2849: craasp_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2850:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2851: 
 2852: craasp_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2853: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2854:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2855:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed)", [EConnReset]),
 2856:     if
 2857:         is_port(Client) ->
 2858:             ?P("   Port Info:     ~p"
 2859:                "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2860:                [try erlang:port_info(Client)
 2861:                 catch
 2862:                     _:_:_ ->
 2863:                         "-"
 2864:                 end,
 2865:                 try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2866:                     {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2867:                     _             -> "-"
 2868:                 catch
 2869:                     _:_:_ ->
 2870:                         "-"
 2871:                 end]);
 2872:         true ->
 2873:             ?P("   Socket Info: ~p", [inet:info(Client)])
 2874:     end,
 2875:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2876:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2877:             ok;
 2878:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2879:             ok;
 2880:         {error, Reason} ->
 2881:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2882:         ok ->
 2883:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2884:     end;
 2885: craasp_verify(win32 = _OS, true = _ISB,
 2886: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2887:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2888:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed): "
 2889:        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 2890:        "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2891:        [EConnReset, inet:info(Client),
 2892: 	try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2893:             {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2894:             _             -> "-"
 2895:         catch
 2896:             _:_:_ ->
 2897:                 "-"
 2898:         end]),
 2899:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2900:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2901:             ok;
 2902:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2903:             ok;
 2904:         {error, Reason} ->
 2905:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2906:         ok ->
 2907:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2908:     end.
 2909: 
 2910: craasp_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2911:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2912:     craasp_cleanup(Sender).
 2913: 
 2914: craasp_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2915:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2916:     receive
 2917:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2918:             ok
 2919:     after 0 ->
 2920:             ok
 2921:     end;
 2922: craasp_cleanup(_) ->
 2923:     ok.
 2924: 
 2925: 
 2926: 
 2927: %%
 2928: %% Test {linger {true, 0}} aborts a connection
 2929: %%
 2930: 
 2931: linger_zero(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2932:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2933:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2934:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2935:                             Addr;
 2936:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2937:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2938:                     end
 2939:            end,
 2940:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) end,
 2941:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2942:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2943: 
 2944: do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) ->
 2945:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 2946:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 2947:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty.
 2948:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2949:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lz_pre(Config, Addr),
 2950: 
 2951:     ?P("[ctrl] populate when"
 2952:        "~n   OS:     ~p"
 2953:        "~n   ISB:    ~p"
 2954:        "~n   Client: ~p"
 2955:        "~n   Server: ~p", [OS, ISB, Client, Server]),
 2956:     PayloadSize  = 1024 * 1024,
 2957:     {ok, Sender} = lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 2958: 
 2959:     ?P("[ctrl] set linger: {true, 0}"),
 2960:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  true}]),
 2961:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2962:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 1}}]),
 2963:     ?P("[ctrl] read back the linger option"),
 2964:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 2965:     %% {ok, [{linger, {true, 1}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 2966:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  false}]),
 2967:     ?P("[ctrl] close client socket"),
 2968:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Client),
 2969:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2970:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 2971: 
 2972:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2973:     lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 2974: 
 2975:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"), % Just in case
 2976:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 2977:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 2978:        true           -> ok
 2979:     end,
 2980: 
 2981:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2982:     ok.
 2983: 
 2984: lz_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2985:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2986:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2987:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 2988:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 2989:                                   {active,          false},
 2990:                                   {recbuf,          4096},
 2991:                                   {show_econnreset, true}]),
 2992:     ?P("listen socket created"),
 2993:     %% inet_backend = inet
 2994:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2995:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 2996:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2997:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 2998:                             {nodelay, true},
 2999:                             {active,  false},
 3000:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 3001:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 3002:                      CSock;
 3003:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3004:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3005:              end,
 3006:     ?P("accept"),
 3007:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3008:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 3009:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 3010:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 3011: 
 3012: lz_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 3013:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 3014:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3015:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 3016:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 3017:     {ok, undefined};
 3018: lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3019:     ?P("[socket] send payload"),
 3020:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3021: 				lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 3022: 			end),
 3023:     receive
 3024:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 3025:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 3026:     after 2000 ->
 3027:             {ok, Sender}
 3028:     end.
 3029: 
 3030: lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3031:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3032:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3033:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3034: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"),
 3035: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3036: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3037: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3038: 	    exit(normal);
 3039:        true ->
 3040: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"),
 3041: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3042: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3043: 	    exit(normal)
 3044:     end.
 3045: 
 3046: 
 3047: lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3048:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3049:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3050:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Client, connected),
 3051:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3052:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3053:     ok;
 3054: lz_verify(_Client, Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3055:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3056:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3057:     ok.
 3058: 
 3059: lz_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3060:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(PayloadSize, $.)).
 3061: 
 3062: %% THIS DOES NOT WORK FOR 'SOCKET'
 3063: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS) when is_port(Sock) ->
 3064:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, 1).
 3065: 
 3066: -define(LZ_MAX_SENDS, 3).
 3067: 
 3068: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, _Payload, _OS, N) when (N > ?LZ_MAX_SENDS) ->
 3069:     ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3070:        "~n   Socket:      ~p"
 3071:        "~n   Socket info: ~p", [Sock, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3072:     ct:fail("Queue size verification failed");
 3073: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N) ->
 3074:     ?P("try send payload (~w bytes) ~w (on client socket) when port info:"
 3075:        "~n   ~p", [byte_size(Payload), N, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3076:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Payload),
 3077:     ?P("try verify client socket queue size"),
 3078:     case erlang:port_info(Sock, queue_size) of
 3079: 	{queue_size, QSz} when QSz > 0 ->
 3080:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* (~p) - port info: "
 3081:                "~n   ~p", [QSz, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3082:             ok;
 3083: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 ->
 3084:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* - port info: "
 3085:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3086:             ok;
 3087: 	{queue_size, 0} ->
 3088:             ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3089:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3090:             lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N+1)
 3091:     end.
 3092: 
 3093: 
 3094: linger_zero_sndbuf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3095:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3096:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3097:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3098:                             Addr;
 3099:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3100:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3101:                     end
 3102:            end,
 3103:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) end,
 3104:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3105:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3106: 
 3107: do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) ->
 3108:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 3109:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 3110:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty
 3111:     %% and the linger zero option is set on the listen socket.
 3112:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lzs_pre(Config, Addr),
 3113:     inet:setopts(Client, [{sys_trace, true}]),
 3114: 
 3115:     PayloadSize = 1024 * 1024,
 3116:     {ok, Sender} = lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 3117: 
 3118:     ?P("verify linger: {true, 0}"),
 3119:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Server, [linger]),
 3120:     ?P("close client socket"),
 3121:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 3122:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 3123: 
 3124:     lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 3125: 
 3126:     ?P("cleanup"), % Just in case
 3127:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 3128:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 3129:        true           -> ok
 3130:     end,
 3131: 
 3132:     ?P("done"),
 3133:     ok.
 3134: 
 3135: lzs_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 3136:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 3137:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 3138:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 3139:     {ok, Listen} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 3140:                                        {active,          false},
 3141:                                        {recbuf,          4096},
 3142:                                        {show_econnreset, true},
 3143:                                        {linger,          {true, 0}}]),
 3144:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
 3145:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 3146:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3147:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 3148:                             {nodelay, true},
 3149:                             {active,  false},
 3150:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 3151:             {ok, CSock} ->
 3152:                 CSock;
 3153:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3154:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3155:         end,
 3156:     ?P("accept"),
 3157:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(Listen),
 3158:     %% On *some* platforms, the linger is inherited,
 3159:     %% but not all so do not assume...
 3160:     ?P("check if linger option was inherited"),
 3161:     case inet:getopts(Server, [linger]) of
 3162: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} ->
 3163: 	    ?P("linger option was inherited"),
 3164: 	    ok;
 3165: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, TO}}]} ->
 3166: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: TRUE, ~p", [TO]),
 3167: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3168: 	    ok;
 3169: 	{ok, [{linger, {false, TO}}]} ->
 3170: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: FALSE, ~p", [TO]),
 3171: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3172: 	    ok;
 3173: 	{error, SReason} ->
 3174: 	    ?P("FAILED reading linger option: ~p", [SReason]),
 3175: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3176: 	    ok
 3177:     end,
 3178:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 3179:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Listen),
 3180:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 3181: 
 3182: lzs_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 3183:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 3184:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3185:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 3186:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 3187:     {ok, undefined};
 3188: lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3189:     ?P("[socket] send payload ( = start payload sender)"),
 3190:     Sender = spawn(fun() ->
 3191: 			   lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 3192: 		   end),
 3193:     receive
 3194:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 3195:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 3196:     after 2000 ->
 3197:             {ok, Sender}
 3198:     end.
 3199: 
 3200: lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3201:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3202:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3203:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3204: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"), 
 3205: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3206: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3207: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3208: 	    exit(normal);
 3209:        true ->
 3210: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"), 
 3211: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3212: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3213: 	    exit(normal)
 3214:     end.
 3215:     
 3216: lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3217:     Payload = binary:copy(<<"0123456789ABCDEF">>, 64 * 1024), % 1 MB
 3218:     if (PayloadSize =:= byte_size(Payload)) ->
 3219:             Payload;
 3220:        true ->
 3221:             exit({payload_size, PayloadSize, byte_size(Payload)})
 3222:     end.
 3223: 
 3224: lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3225:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3226:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3227:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Server, connected),
 3228:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3229:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3230:     ok;
 3231: lzs_verify(Client, _Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3232:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3233:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3234:     ok.
 3235:     
 3236: %% Thanks to Luke Gorrie. Tests for a very specific problem with 
 3237: %% corrupt data. The testcase will be killed by the timetrap timeout
 3238: %% if the bug is present.
 3239: http_bad_packet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3240:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3241:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3242:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3243:                             Addr;
 3244:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3245:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3246:                     end
 3247:            end,
 3248:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) end,
 3249:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3250:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3251: 
 3252: do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) ->
 3253:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,        Addr},
 3254:                                  {active,    false},
 3255:                                  binary,
 3256:                                  {reuseaddr, true},
 3257:                                  {packet,    http}]),
 3258:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3259:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 3260:                        erlang:yield(),
 3261:                        http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port)
 3262:                end),
 3263:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3264:         {ok,S} ->
 3265:             http_worker(S);
 3266:         Err ->
 3267:             exit({accept,Err})
 3268:     end.
 3269: 
 3270: http_worker(S) ->
 3271:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, 30000) of
 3272: 	{ok,{http_error,Error}} ->
 3273: 	     io:format("Http error: ~s\n", [Error]);
 3274: 	{ok,Data} ->
 3275: 	    io:format("Data: ~p\n", [Data]),
 3276: 	    http_worker(S)
 3277:     end.
 3278: 
 3279: http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port) ->
 3280:     {ok,S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3281:                       [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}, binary]),
 3282:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, "\r\n"),
 3283:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S).
 3284: 
 3285: 
 3286: %% Fill send queue and then start receiving.
 3287: %%
 3288: busy_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3289:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3290:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3291:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3292:                             Addr;
 3293:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3294:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3295:                     end
 3296:            end,
 3297:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_send(Config, Addr) end,
 3298:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3299:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3300: 
 3301: do_busy_send(Config, Addr) ->
 3302:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3303:     Master  = self(),
 3304:     Msg     = <<"the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n">>,
 3305:     ?P("[master] start server"),
 3306:     ServerF =
 3307:         fun() ->
 3308:                 ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3309:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,
 3310:                                          {ip,        Addr},
 3311:                                          {active,    false},
 3312:                                          {reuseaddr, true},
 3313:                                          {packet,    0},
 3314:                                          {recbuf,    4096},
 3315:                                          {sndbuf,    4096}]) of
 3316:                     {ok, L} ->
 3317:                         ?P("[server] listen socket created"),
 3318:                         {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 3319:                         Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3320:                         ?P("[server] await continue"),
 3321:                         receive
 3322:                             {Master, continue} ->
 3323:                                 ?P("[server] received continue"),
 3324:                                 busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg)
 3325:                         end;
 3326:                     {error, Reason} ->
 3327:                         ?P("[server] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [Reason]),
 3328:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 3329:                 end
 3330:         end,
 3331:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3332:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3333:     ListenPort =
 3334:         receive
 3335:             {'EXIT', Server, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 3336:                 ?P("[master] server issued skip: "
 3337:                    "~n      ~p", [SKIP]),
 3338:                 throw(SKIP);
 3339: 
 3340:             {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 3341:                 ?P("[master] server crashed: "
 3342:                    "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 3343:                 exit({server, Reason});
 3344: 
 3345:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3346:                 ?P("listen port: ~p", [LP]),
 3347:                 LP
 3348:         end,
 3349:     ?P("[master] start client"),
 3350:     ClientF = 
 3351:       fun () ->
 3352:               ?P("[client] await (connect) server port"),
 3353:               Port =
 3354:                   receive
 3355:                       {Master, connect, P} ->
 3356:                           P
 3357:                   end,
 3358:               ?P("[client] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3359: 	      case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3360:                             [binary,
 3361:                              {ip,     Addr},
 3362:                              {active, false},
 3363:                              {packet, 0},
 3364:                              {recbuf, 4096},
 3365:                              {sndbuf, 4096}]) of
 3366:                   {ok, Socket} ->
 3367:                       Master ! {self(), connected},
 3368:                       ?P("[client] connected - await recv"),
 3369:                       receive
 3370:                           {Master, recv, N} ->
 3371:                               ?P("[client] received recv:~w", [N]),
 3372:                               busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N)
 3373:                       end;
 3374:                   {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3375:                       ?P("[client] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [CReason]),
 3376:                       ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3377:               end
 3378:       end,
 3379:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3380:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [Client]),
 3381:     Server ! {self(), continue},
 3382:     Client ! {self(), connect, ListenPort},
 3383:     receive
 3384:         {Client, connected} ->
 3385:             ?P("[master] client connected"),
 3386:             ok
 3387:     end,
 3388:     busy_send_loop(Server, Client, 0),
 3389:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 3390:     ?P("[master] done"),
 3391:     ok.
 3392: 
 3393: busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N) ->
 3394:     %% Master
 3395:     %%
 3396:     receive
 3397:         {Server, send} ->
 3398:             busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N+1)
 3399: 
 3400:     after 2000 ->
 3401:             ?P("[master] send timeout: server send queue full (N = ~w+1)", [N]),
 3402:             %% Send queue full, sender blocked 
 3403:             %% -> stop sender and release client
 3404:             Server ! {self(), close},
 3405:             Client ! {self(), recv, N+1},
 3406:             ?P("[master] await server 'send'..."),
 3407:             receive
 3408:                 {Server, send} ->
 3409:                     busy_send_2(Server, Client, N+1)
 3410:             after 10000 ->
 3411:                     %% If this happens, see busy_send_srv
 3412:                     ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server send timeout"),
 3413:                     ct:fail({timeout,{server,not_send,flush([])}})
 3414:             end
 3415:     end.
 3416: 
 3417: busy_send_2(Server, Client, _N) ->
 3418:     %% Master
 3419:     %%
 3420:     ?P("[master] await (server) closed"),
 3421:     receive
 3422:         {Server, [closed]} ->
 3423:             ?P("[master] received expected (server) closed - "
 3424:                "await client closed"),
 3425:             receive
 3426:                 {Client, [0,{error,closed}]} ->
 3427:                     ?P("[master] received expected (client) closed"),
 3428:                     ok
 3429:             end
 3430:     after 10000 ->
 3431:             ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server closed timeout"),
 3432:             ct:fail({timeout, {server, not_closed, flush([])}})
 3433:     end.
 3434: 
 3435: busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg) ->
 3436:     %% Server
 3437:     %% Sometimes this accept does not return, do not really know why
 3438:     %% but it causes the timeout error in busy_send_loop to be
 3439:     %% triggered. Only happens on OS X Leopard?!?
 3440:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3441:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3442:         {ok, Socket} ->
 3443:             ?P("[server] accepted"),
 3444:             busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg);
 3445:         {error, Reason} ->
 3446:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: server accept failure: ~p", [Reason]),
 3447:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason))
 3448:     end.
 3449: 
 3450: busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg) ->
 3451:     %% Server
 3452:     %%
 3453:     receive
 3454: 	{Master, close} ->
 3455:             ?P("[server] received close"),
 3456: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 3457: 	    Master ! {self(),flush([closed])}
 3458:     after 0 ->
 3459: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 3460: 	    Master ! {self(), send},
 3461: 	    busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg)
 3462:     end.
 3463: 
 3464: busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N) ->
 3465:     %% Client
 3466:     %%
 3467:     Size = byte_size(Msg),
 3468:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, Size) of
 3469: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3470: 	    busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N-1);
 3471: 	Other ->
 3472:             ?P("[client] recv response: "
 3473:                "~n      ~p", [Other]),
 3474: 	    Master ! {self(), flush([Other,N])}
 3475:     end.
 3476: 
 3477: %%%
 3478: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3479: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error.
 3480: %%% (Passive mode.)
 3481: %%%
 3482: 
 3483: busy_disconnect_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3484:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3485:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3486:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3487:                             Addr;
 3488:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3489:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3490:                     end
 3491:            end,
 3492:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) end,
 3493:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3494:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3495: 
 3496: do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 3497:     ?P("[passive] begin"),
 3498:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3499:     [do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3500:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3501:     ?P("[passive] done"),
 3502:     ok.
 3503: 
 3504: do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3505:     ?P("[passive,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3506:     {_Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,false}]),
 3507:     ?P("[passive,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3508:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3509:     busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, MuchoData, OSName).
 3510: 
 3511: busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS) ->
 3512:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3513: 	ok ->
 3514:             busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS);
 3515: 	{error, closed} ->
 3516:             ok;
 3517: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3518: 	    ?P("send failed with ~w", [Reason]),
 3519:             ok
 3520:     end.
 3521: 
 3522: %%%
 3523: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3524: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error and
 3525: %%% a {tcp_closed,Socket} message. (Active mode.)
 3526: %%%
 3527: busy_disconnect_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3528:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3529:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3530:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3531:                             Addr;
 3532:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3533:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3534:                     end
 3535:            end,
 3536:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) end,
 3537:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3538:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3539: 
 3540: do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) ->
 3541:     ?P("[active] begin"),
 3542:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3543:     [do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3544:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3545:     ?P("[active] done"),
 3546:     ok.
 3547: 
 3548: do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3549:     ?P("[active,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3550:     {Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,true}]),
 3551:     ?P("[active,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3552:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, MuchoData).
 3553: 
 3554: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data) ->
 3555:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3556:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, 1, OSName).
 3557: 
 3558: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter, OS) ->
 3559:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3560: 	ok ->
 3561:             busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter+1, OS);
 3562: 	{error, closed} ->
 3563:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with closed - await tcp-closed",
 3564: 	       [Iter]),
 3565:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3566: 
 3567: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3568:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with ~w - await tcp-closed",
 3569: 	       [Iter, Reason]),
 3570:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3571: 
 3572:         {error, einval = Reason} ->
 3573:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3574:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3575:             ?SKIPT(send_failed_str(Reason));
 3576: 
 3577:         {error, Reason} ->
 3578:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3579:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3580:             ct:fail({unexpected_send_result, Reason, Iter})
 3581:     end.
 3582: 
 3583: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S) ->
 3584:     busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, false, false).
 3585: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, Stopped) ->
 3586:     receive
 3587:         {tcp_closed, S} when (Stopped =:= true) ->
 3588:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed - done"),
 3589:             ok;
 3590: 
 3591:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 3592:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed"),
 3593:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, true, Stopped);
 3594: 
 3595:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} when (Closed =:= true) ->
 3596:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit - done"),
 3597:             ok;
 3598: 
 3599:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 3600:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit"),
 3601:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, true);
 3602: 
 3603:         Other ->
 3604:             ?P("[active-sender] received UNEXPECTED message:"
 3605:                "~n   Expected tcp-close of ~p"
 3606:                "~n   Server:               ~p"
 3607:                "~n   Unexpected message:   ~p", [S, Server, Other]),
 3608:             ct:fail({unexpected, Other, S, flush([])})
 3609:     end.
 3610:     
 3611: 
 3612: busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, ConnectOpts) ->
 3613:     Sender = self(),
 3614:     ?P("[prep-server] create server"),
 3615:     Server = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3616:                                 busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender)
 3617:                         end),
 3618:     ?P("[prep-server] await port (from server)"),
 3619:     receive {port, Server, Port} -> ok end,
 3620:     ?P("[prep-server] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3621:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | ConnectOpts]) of
 3622:         {ok, S} ->
 3623:             ?P("[prep-server] connected - order server start sending"),
 3624:             Server ! {Sender, sending},
 3625:             ?P("[prep-server] done"),
 3626:             {Server, S};
 3627:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3628:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3629:     end.
 3630: 
 3631: busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender) ->
 3632:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3633:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 3634:                       [binary,
 3635:                        {ip,        Addr},
 3636:                        {active,    false},
 3637:                        {reuseaddr, true},
 3638:                        {packet,    0}]),
 3639:     ?P("[server] created - get port number"),
 3640:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3641:     ?P("[server] send port ~w (to sender)", [Port]),
 3642:     Sender ! {port,self(),Port},
 3643:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3644:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3645:     ?P("[server] connection accepted"),
 3646:     receive
 3647: 	{Sender, sending} ->
 3648:             ?P("[server] received sending (from sender)"),
 3649: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3650:     end.
 3651: 
 3652: %% Close the socket as soon as the Sender process can't send because of
 3653: %% a busy port.
 3654: busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S) ->
 3655:     case process_info(Sender, status) of
 3656: 	{status, waiting = Status} ->
 3657: 	    %% We KNOW that the sender will be in state 'waiting' only
 3658: 	    %% if the port has become busy. (Fallback solution if the
 3659: 	    %% implementation changes: Watch Sender's reduction count;
 3660: 	    %% when it stops changing, wait 2 seconds and then close.)
 3661: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p => close socket", [Status]),
 3662: 	    gen_tcp:close(S);
 3663: 	{status, Status} ->
 3664: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Status]),
 3665: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3666: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S);
 3667: 	Other ->
 3668: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Other]),
 3669: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3670: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3671:     end.
 3672: 
 3673: 
 3674: %%%
 3675: %%% Fill send queue
 3676: %%%
 3677: fill_sendq(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3678:     Cond = fun() ->
 3679: 		   is_windows() andalso ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 3680: 		       skip("Unstable for 'socket on Windows'"),
 3681: 		   ok
 3682: 	   end,
 3683:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3684:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3685:                             Addr;
 3686:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3687:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3688:                     end
 3689:            end,
 3690:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) end,
 3691:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3692:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3693: 
 3694: do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) ->
 3695:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3696:     Master  = self(),
 3697:     ServerF =
 3698:         fun () ->
 3699:                 ?P("[server] try listen"),
 3700:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr},
 3701:                                          {active,false},binary,
 3702:                                          {reuseaddr,true},{packet,0}]) of
 3703:                     {ok, L} ->
 3704:                         ?P("[server] try port"),
 3705:                         case inet:port(L) of
 3706:                             {ok, Port} ->
 3707:                                 Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3708:                                 fill_sendq_srv(L, Master);
 3709:                             {error, PReason} ->
 3710:                                 ?SKIPE(port_failed_str(PReason))
 3711:                         end;
 3712:                     {error, LReason} ->
 3713:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 3714:                 end
 3715:         end,
 3716:     Server  = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3717:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3718:     ClientF =
 3719:         fun () ->
 3720:                 ?P("[client] await server port"),
 3721:                 ServerPort =
 3722:                     receive
 3723:                         {Master, server_port, SP} ->
 3724:                             ?P("[client] server port: ~w", [SP]),
 3725:                             SP
 3726:                     end,
 3727:                 %% Just close on order
 3728:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 3729:                 case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, ServerPort,
 3730:                               [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{packet,0}]) of
 3731:                     {ok, S} ->
 3732:                         ?P("[client] connected ~p"
 3733:                            "~n   when"
 3734:                            "~n      buffer sz:         ~p"
 3735:                            "~n      receive buffer sz: ~p",
 3736:                            [S, which_buffer(S), which_recbuf(S)]),
 3737:                         Master ! {self(), connected},
 3738:                         receive
 3739:                             {Master, close} ->
 3740:                                 ?P("[client] received close"),
 3741:                                 ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 3742:                         end;
 3743:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3744:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3745:                 end
 3746:         end,
 3747:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3748:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [client]),
 3749:     ListenPort =
 3750:         receive
 3751:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3752:                 ?P("[master] listen port: ~w", [LP]),
 3753:                 LP
 3754:         end,
 3755:     Client ! {self(), server_port, ListenPort},
 3756:     ?P("[master] await client connected"),
 3757:     receive {Client, connected} -> ok end,
 3758:     ?P("[master] await reader"),
 3759:     Res = receive
 3760:               {Server, reader, ServerSock, Reader} ->
 3761:                   ?P("[master] reader: ~p", [Reader]),
 3762:                   fill_sendq_loop(ServerSock, Server, Reader, Client)
 3763:           end,
 3764:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),    
 3765:     ?P("[master] done: ~p", [Res]),
 3766:     case Res of
 3767:         {ok, NumSends} ->
 3768:             {comment, "Num Sends: " ++ integer_to_list(NumSends)};
 3769:         _ ->
 3770:             Res
 3771:     end.
 3772: 
 3773: fill_sendq_loop(ServerSock, Server, Reader, Client) ->
 3774:     fill_sendq_loop(ServerSock, Server, Reader, Client, 0).
 3775: 
 3776: %% Server: Writer
 3777: %% Client: Connects and then just waits
 3778: %% Reader: Reader spawned by the Server
 3779: fill_sendq_loop(ServerSock, Server, Reader, Client, NumSent) ->
 3780:     %% Master
 3781:     %%
 3782:     receive
 3783:         {Server, send} ->
 3784: 	    fill_sendq_loop(ServerSock, Server, Reader, Client, NumSent + 1)
 3785:     after 2000 ->
 3786: 	    %% Send queue full, sender blocked -> close client.
 3787: 	    ?P("[master] send timeout (~p), closing client", [NumSent]),
 3788:             _ = inet:setopts(ServerSock, [{debug, true}]),
 3789: 	    Client ! {self(), close},
 3790: 	    receive
 3791:                 {Server, [{error,closed}] = SErrors} ->
 3792:                     ?P("[master] got expected server (~p) closed", [Server]),
 3793:                     receive
 3794:                         {Reader, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3795:                             ?P("[master] got expected reader closed"),
 3796:                             {ok, NumSent};
 3797:                         {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3798:                             ct:fail([{server,   SErrors},
 3799:                                      {reader,   RErrors},
 3800:                                      {num_sent, NumSent}])
 3801:                     after 3000 ->
 3802:                             ct:fail({timeout, {closed, reader}, NumSent})
 3803:                     end;
 3804: 
 3805:                 {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3806:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED SERVER (~p) ERROR(S): "
 3807:                        "~n   ~p"
 3808:                        "~n   ~p", [Server, SErrors, flush([])]),
 3809:                     ct:fail([{server,   SErrors},
 3810:                              {reader,   []},
 3811:                              {num_sent, NumSent}]);
 3812: 
 3813:                 {Reader, [{error,closed}] = RErrors} ->
 3814:                     ?P("[master] got expected reader (~p) closed", [Reader]),
 3815:                     receive
 3816:                         {Server, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3817:                             ?P("[master] got expected server (~p) closed",
 3818:                                [Server]),
 3819:                             {ok, NumSent};
 3820:                         {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3821:                             ?P("[master] got unexpected server (~p) error(s):"
 3822:                                "~n      ~p"
 3823:                                "~n   when"
 3824:                                "~n      Num Sent: ~p",
 3825:                                [Server, SErrors, NumSent]),
 3826:                             ct:fail([{server,   SErrors},
 3827:                                      {reader,   RErrors},
 3828:                                      {num_sent, NumSent}])
 3829:                     after 3000 ->
 3830:                             ct:fail({timeout, {closed, server}, NumSent})
 3831:                     end;
 3832: 
 3833:                 {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3834:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED READER (~p) ERROR(S): "
 3835:                        "~n   ~p"
 3836:                        "~n   ~p", [Reader, RErrors, flush([])]),
 3837:                     ct:fail([{server,   []},
 3838:                              {reader,   RErrors},
 3839:                              {num_sent, NumSent}])
 3840: 
 3841:             after 3000 ->
 3842:                     Msgs = flush([]),
 3843:                     ct:fail({timeout, {closed, [server,reader]}, NumSent, Msgs})
 3844:             end
 3845:     end.
 3846: 
 3847: fill_sendq_srv(L, Master) ->
 3848:     %% Server
 3849:     %%
 3850:     ?P("[server] await accept"),
 3851:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3852: 	{ok, S} ->
 3853:             ?P("[server] accepted ~p"
 3854:                "~n   when"
 3855:                "~n      buffer sz:      ~p"
 3856:                "~n      send buffer sz: ~p",
 3857:                [S, which_buffer(S), which_sndbuf(S)]),
 3858: 	    Master ! {self(), reader, S,
 3859: 		      spawn_link(fun () -> fill_sendq_read(S, Master) end)},
 3860: 	    Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n",
 3861: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, [Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg]);
 3862: 	E ->
 3863:             Error = flush([E]),
 3864: 	    ?P("[server] accept error: ~p", [E]),
 3865: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3866:     end.
 3867: 
 3868: which_recbuf(S) ->
 3869:     which_optval(S, recbuf, undefined).
 3870: 
 3871: which_buffer(S) ->
 3872:     which_optval(S, buffer, undefined).
 3873: 
 3874: which_sndbuf(S) ->
 3875:     which_optval(S, sndbuf, undefined).
 3876: 
 3877: which_optval(S, Tag, Default) ->
 3878:     case inet:getopts(S, [Tag]) of
 3879:         {ok, [{Tag, Val}]} ->
 3880:             Val;
 3881:         _ ->
 3882:             Default
 3883:     end.
 3884: 
 3885: fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg) ->
 3886:     %% Server
 3887:     %%
 3888:     %% ?P("[server,writer] sending..."),
 3889:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Msg) of
 3890: 	ok ->
 3891:             Master ! {self(), send},
 3892: 	    %% ?P("[server,writer] ok."),
 3893: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg);
 3894: 	{error, _} = E ->
 3895: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3896: 	    ?P("[server,writer] send error"
 3897:                "~n      Errors:      ~p"
 3898:                "~n   when"
 3899:                "~n      Socket info: ~p", [Error, inet:info(S)]),
 3900: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3901:     end.
 3902: 
 3903: fill_sendq_read(S, Master) ->
 3904:     %% Reader
 3905:     %% The client never send anything, so we should never receive anything,
 3906:     %% but just in case...
 3907:     ?P("[server,reader] read infinity..."),
 3908:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, infinity) of
 3909: 	{ok, Data} ->
 3910: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv: ~p", [Data]),
 3911: 	    fill_sendq_read(S, Master);
 3912: 	E ->
 3913: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3914: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv error"
 3915:                "~n      Errors:      ~p"
 3916:                "~n   when"
 3917:                "~n      Socket info: ~p", [Error, inet:info(S)]),
 3918: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3919:     end.
 3920: 
 3921: 
 3922: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3923: %%% a closed socket.
 3924: %%%
 3925: partial_recv_and_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3926:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3927:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3928:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3929:                             Addr;
 3930:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3931:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3932:                     end
 3933:            end,
 3934:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) end,
 3935:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3936:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3937: 
 3938: do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) ->
 3939:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3940:     Len = length(Msg),
 3941:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3942:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 3943:     Sock =
 3944:         case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 3945:             {ok, S} ->
 3946:                 S;
 3947:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3948:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3949:     end,
 3950:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3951:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Msg),
 3952:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 3953:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 3954:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 3955: 	{error, closed} ->
 3956: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3957: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3958: 	    ok;
 3959: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 3960: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 3961: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 3962: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3963: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3964: 	    error;
 3965: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3966: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with expected message): "
 3967: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 3968: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3969: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3970: 	    error;
 3971: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 3972: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with unexpected message): "
 3973: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 3974: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3975: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3976: 	    error
 3977:     end.
 3978: 
 3979: 
 3980: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3981: %%% a closed socket, this time waiting in the recv before closing.
 3982: %%%
 3983: partial_recv_and_close_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3984:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3985:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3986:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3987:                             Addr;
 3988:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3989:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3990:                     end
 3991:            end,
 3992:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) end,
 3993:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3994:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3995: 
 3996: do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) ->
 3997:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3998:     Len = length(Msg),
 3999:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4000:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 4001:     Server = self(),
 4002:     Client =
 4003: 	spawn_link(
 4004: 	  fun () ->
 4005: 		  receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 4006: 		  case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 4007:                       {ok, S} ->
 4008:                           ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Msg),
 4009:                           receive {Server,close} -> ok end,
 4010:                           receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 4011:                           ok = gen_tcp:close(S);
 4012:                       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4013:                           ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4014:                   end
 4015: 	  end),
 4016:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 4017:     Client ! {Server, close},
 4018:     %% {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1),
 4019:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 4020:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 4021: 	{error, closed} ->
 4022: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4023: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4024: 	    ok;
 4025: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 4026: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 4027: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 4028: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4029: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4030: 	    error;
 4031: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 4032: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with 'expected' message): "
 4033: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 4034: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4035: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4036: 	    error;
 4037: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 4038: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with *unexpected* message): "
 4039: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 4040: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4041: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4042: 	    error
 4043:     end.
 4044: 
 4045: %%% Here we tests that gen_tcp:recv/2 will return {error,closed} following
 4046: %%% a send operation of a huge amount data when the other end closed the socket.
 4047: %%%
 4048: partial_recv_and_close_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4049:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4050:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4051:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4052:                             Addr;
 4053:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4054:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4055:                     end
 4056:            end,
 4057:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) end,
 4058:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4059:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4060: 
 4061: do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) ->
 4062:     [do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) || _ <- lists:seq(0, 20)],
 4063:     ok.
 4064: 
 4065: do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) ->
 4066:     Parent = self(),
 4067:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 4068: 		       {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 4069:                                         [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4070: 		       {ok, {_,Port}} = inet:sockname(L),
 4071: 		       Parent ! {port,Port},
 4072: 		       {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 4073: 		       gen_tcp:recv(S, 1),
 4074: 		       gen_tcp:close(S)
 4075: 	       end),
 4076:     receive
 4077: 	{port,Port} -> ok
 4078:     end,
 4079:     Much = ones(8*64*1024),
 4080:     S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 4081:             {ok, Sock} ->
 4082:                 Sock;
 4083:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4084:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4085:     end,
 4086: 
 4087:     %% Send a lot of data (most of it will be queued).
 4088:     %% The receiver will read one byte and close the connection.
 4089:     %% The write operation will fail.
 4090:     gen_tcp:send(S, Much),
 4091: 
 4092:     %% We should always get {error,closed} here.
 4093:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0).
 4094:

 4096: test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr) ->
 4097:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4098:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> create listen socket"),
 4099:     {ok,L1} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4100:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4101:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]),
 4102:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts tos (= ~p)", [Tos]),
 4103:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{tos,Tos}]),
 4104:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4105:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4106:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4107:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]), % Dont destroy each other
 4108:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4109:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4110:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts reuseaddr (= true)"),
 4111:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{reuseaddr,true}]), % Dont let others destroy
 4112:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4113:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4114:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> close listen socket"),
 4115:     gen_tcp:close(L1),
 4116:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> done"),
 4117:     ok.
