 4119: test_prio_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4120:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> create listen socket"),
 4121:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4122:                                      {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4}]),
 4123:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4124:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4125:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4126:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4127:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4128:                                                {packet,0},
 4129:                                                {active,false},
 4130:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4131:                                                {priority,4}]) of
 4132:                 {ok, S2} -> 
 4133:                     S2;
 4134:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4135:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4136:             end,
 4137:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connected => accept connection"),
 4138:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4139:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> accepted => getopts prio for listen socket"),
 4140:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,  [priority]),
 4141:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for connected socket"),
 4142:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority]),
 4143:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for accepted socket"),
 4144:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3, [priority]),
 4145:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close listen socket"),
 4146:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4147:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close connected socket"),
 4148:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4149:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close accepted socket"),
 4150:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4151:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> done"),
 4152:     ok.

 4154: test_prio_accept2(Config, Addr) ->
 4155:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4156:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4157:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> create listen socket"),
 4158:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4159:                                     {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4},
 4160:                                     {tos,Tos1}]),
 4161:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4162:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4163:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4164:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4165:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4166:                                                {packet,0},
 4167:                                                {active,false},
 4168:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4169:                                                {priority,4},
 4170:                                                {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4171:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4172:                     S2;
 4173:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4174:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4175:             end,
 4176:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> connected => accept connection"),
 4177:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4178:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> accepted => getopts prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4179:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos]),
 4180:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4181:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2,[priority,tos]),
 4182:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> getopts prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4183:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos]),
 4184:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close listen socket"),
 4185:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4186:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close connected socket"),
 4187:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4188:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close accepted socket"),
 4189:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4190:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> done"),
 4191:     ok.
 4192: 
 4193: test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr) ->
 4194:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4195:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4196:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> create listen socket"),
 4197:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary,{ip, Addr},{packet,0},{active,false},
 4198:                                     {reuseaddr,true},
 4199:                                     {tos,Tos1}]),
 4200:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4201:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4202:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4203:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4204:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4205:                                                {packet,0},
 4206:                                                {active,false},
 4207:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4208:                                                {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4209:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4210:                     S2;
 4211:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4212:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4213:     end,
 4214:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> connected => accept connection"),
 4215:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4216:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> "
 4217:        "accepted => getopts prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4218:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,  [priority,tos]),
 4219:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4220:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4221:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> getopts prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4222:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3, [priority,tos]),
 4223:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close listen socket"),
 4224:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4225:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close connected socket"),
 4226:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4227:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close accepted socket"),
 4228:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4229:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> done"),
 4230:     ok.
 4231:     
 4232: test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr) ->
 4233:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4234:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4235:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4236:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> create prio server"),
 4237:     spawn(?MODULE, priority_server, [Config, Addr, {self(),Ref}]),
 4238:     Port = receive
 4239:                {Ref,P} -> P
 4240:            after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4241:            end,
 4242:     receive
 4243:     after 3000 -> ok
 4244:     end,
 4245:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4246:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4247: 					      {ip, Addr},
 4248: 					      {packet,0},
 4249:                                               {active,false},
 4250:                                               {reuseaddr,true},
 4251:                                               {priority,4},
 4252:                                               {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4253:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4254:                     S2;
 4255:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4256:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4257:             end,
 4258:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> "
 4259:        "connected => await prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4260:     receive
 4261:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4262:             ok;
 4263:         {Ref,Error} ->
 4264:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error})
 4265:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4266:     end,
 4267:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> await prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4268:     receive
 4269:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4270:             ok;
 4271:         {Ref,Error2} ->
 4272:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error2})
 4273:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4274:     end,
 4275: 
 4276:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4277:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4278:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> close connected socket"),
 4279:     catch gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4280:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> done"),
 4281:     ok.
 4282: 
 4283: priority_server(Config, Addr, {Parent,Ref}) ->
 4284:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4285:     {ok,Sock}=?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4286:                                 {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4},
 4287:                                 {tos,Tos1}]),
 4288:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4289:     Parent ! {Ref,Port},
 4290:     {ok,Sock3}=gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4291:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos])},
 4292:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos])},
 4293:     ok.
 4294: 
 4295: test_prio_fail(Config, Addr) ->
 4296:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> create listen socket"),
 4297:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4298:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> try set (and fail) opts prio (= 1000)"),
 4299:     {error,_} = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1000}]),
 4300:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close listen socket"),
 4301:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 4302:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4303:     ok.
 4304: 
 4305: test_prio_udp(Addr) ->
 4306:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4307:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> create UDP socket (open)"),
 4308:     {ok,S} = gen_udp:open(0,[{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{tos, Tos},
 4309:                              {priority,3}]),
 4310:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> getopts prio and tos"),
 4311:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(S,[priority,tos]),
 4312:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close socket"),
 4313:     gen_udp:close(S),
 4314:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4315:     ok.
 4316: 
 4317: %% Tests the so_priority and ip_tos options on sockets when applicable.
 4318: so_priority(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4319:     Cond = fun() ->
 4320: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 4321: 		       true ->
 4322: 		           is_socket_supported(),
 4323:                            has_support_sock_priority();
 4324: 		       false ->
 4325: 			   ok
 4326: 		   end
 4327:     	 end,
 4328:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4329:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4330:                             Addr;
 4331:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4332:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4333:                     end
 4334:            end,
 4335:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_so_priority(Config, Addr) end,
 4336:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4337:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4338: 
 4339: do_so_priority(Config, Addr) ->
 4340:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 4341:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4342:     ?P("set opts on listen socket: prio to 1"),
 4343:     ok = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1}]),
 4344:     ?P("verify prio"),
 4345:     case inet:getopts(L,[priority]) of
 4346: 	{ok,[{priority,1}]} ->
 4347:             ?P("close listen socket"),
 4348: 	    gen_tcp:close(L),
 4349: 	    test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr),
 4350: 	    test_prio_accept(Config, Addr),
 4351: 	    test_prio_accept2(Config, Addr),
 4352: 	    test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr),
 4353: 	    test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr),
 4354: 	    test_prio_fail(Config, Addr),
 4355: 	    test_prio_udp(Addr),
 4356:             ?P("done"),
 4357: 	    ok;
 4358: 	_X ->
 4359: 	    case os:type() of
 4360: 		{unix,linux} ->
 4361: 		    case os:version() of
 4362: 			{X,Y,_} when (X > 2) or ((X =:= 2) and (Y >= 4)) ->
 4363:                             ?P("so prio should work on this version: "
 4364:                                "~n      ~p", [_X]),
 4365: 			    ct:fail({error,
 4366: 					   "so_priority should work on this "
 4367: 					   "OS, but does not"});
 4368: 			_ ->
 4369: 			    {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4370: 		    end;
 4371: 		_ ->
 4372: 		   {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4373: 	    end
 4374:     end.
 4375: 
 4376: 
 4377: 
 4378: %% IP_RECVTOS and IP_RECVTCLASS for IP_PKTOPTIONS
 4379: %% does not seem to be implemented in Linux until kernel 3.1
 4380: %%
 4381: %% It seems pktoptions does not return valid values
 4382: %% for IPv4 connect sockets.  On the accept socket
 4383: %% we get valid values, but on the connect socket we get
 4384: %% the default values for TOS and TTL.
 4385: %%
 4386: %% Therefore the argument CheckConnect that enables
 4387: %% checking the returned values for the connect socket.
 4388: %% It is only used for recvtclass that is an IPv6 option
 4389: %% and there we get valid values from both socket ends.
 4390: 
 4391: has_support_ip_pktoptions() ->
 4392:     has_support_ip_option(pktoptions).
 4393: 
 4394: has_support_ip_recvtos() ->
 4395:     has_support_ip_option(recvtos).
 4396: 
 4397: has_support_ip_recvttl() ->
 4398:     has_support_ip_option(recvttl).
 4399: 
 4400: has_support_ipv6_pktoptions() ->
 4401:     has_support_ipv6_option(pktoptions).
 4402: 
 4403: has_support_ipv6_tclass() ->
 4404:     has_support_ipv6_option(tclass).
 4405: 
 4406: has_support_ip_option(Opt) ->
 4407:     has_support_option(ip, Opt).
 4408: 
 4409: has_support_ipv6_option(Opt) ->
 4410:     has_support_option(ipv6, Opt).
 4411: 
 4412: has_support_option(Level, Option) ->
 4413:     try socket:is_supported(options, Level, Option)
 4414:     catch
 4415: 	_:_:_ -> false % Any platform that does not support socket!
 4416:     end.
 4417: 
 4418: has_os_support_recvtos() ->
 4419:     has_os_support_recvtos(os:type(), os:version()).
 4420: 
 4421: has_os_support_recvtos({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4422:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4423: has_os_support_recvtos(_, _) ->
 4424:     true.
 4425: 
 4426: has_os_support_recvttl() ->
 4427:     has_os_support_recvttl(os:type(), os:version()).
 4428: 
 4429: has_os_support_recvttl({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4430:     not semver_lt(Version, {2,7,0});
 4431: has_os_support_recvttl(_, _) ->
 4432:     %% We should not even get here, but just in case...
 4433:     false.
 4434: 
 4435: has_os_support_recvtclass() ->
 4436:     has_os_support_recvtclass(os:type(), os:version()).
 4437: 
 4438: has_os_support_recvtclass({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4439:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4440: has_os_support_recvtclass(_, _) ->
 4441:     true.
 4442: 
 4443: semver_lt({X1,Y1,Z1} = V1, {X2,Y2,Z2} = V2) ->
 4444:     ?P("semver_lt -> OS version check:"
 4445:        "~n   (Actual)  Version 1: ~p"
 4446:        "~n   (Request) Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4447:     if
 4448:         X1 > X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 > X2: ~p > ~p", [X1, X2]), false;
 4449:         X1 < X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 < X2: ~p < ~p", [X1, X2]), true;
 4450:         Y1 > Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 > Y2: ~p > ~p", [Y1, Y2]), false;
 4451:         Y1 < Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 < Y2: ~p < ~p", [Y1, Y2]), true;
 4452:         Z1 > Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 > Z2: ~p > ~p", [Z1, Z2]), false;
 4453:         Z1 < Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 < Z2: ~p < ~p", [Z1, Z2]), true;
 4454:         true    -> ?P("semver_lt -> default"), false
 4455:     end;
 4456: semver_lt(V1, {_,_,_} = V2) ->
 4457:     ?P("semver_lt -> fallback OS version check when: "
 4458:        "~n   Version 1: ~p"
 4459:        "~n   Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4460:     false.
 4461: 
 4462: recvtos(Config) ->
 4463:     test_pktoptions(
 4464:       Config,
 4465:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96}],
 4466:       fun() ->
 4467:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4468:                   has_os_support_recvtos() 
 4469:      end,
 4470:       "recvtos",
 4471:       false).
 4472: 
 4473: recvtosttl(Config) ->
 4474:     test_pktoptions(
 4475:       Config,
 4476:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96},{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4477:       fun() ->
 4478:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4479: 		  has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4480:                   has_os_support_recvtos() andalso
 4481:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4482:       end,
 4483:       "recvtos and/or recvttl",
 4484:       false).
 4485: 
 4486: recvttl(Config) ->
 4487:     test_pktoptions(
 4488:       Config,
 4489:       inet, [{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4490:       fun() ->
 4491:               has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4492:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4493:       end,
 4494:       "recvttl",
 4495:       false).
 4496: 
 4497: recvtclass(Config) ->
 4498:     {ok,IFs} = inet:getifaddrs(),
 4499:     case
 4500:         [Name ||
 4501:             {Name,Opts} <- IFs,
 4502:             lists:member({addr,{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}}, Opts)]
 4503:     of
 4504:         [_] ->
 4505:             test_pktoptions(
 4506:               Config,
 4507:               inet6, [{recvtclass,tclass,224}],
 4508:               fun() ->
 4509:                       has_support_ipv6_tclass() andalso
 4510:                           has_os_support_recvtclass()
 4511:               end,
 4512:               "tclass",
 4513:               true);
 4514:         [] ->
 4515:             {skip,{ipv6_not_supported,IFs}}
 4516:     end.
 4517: 
 4518: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, OptCond, OptStr, CheckConnect) ->
 4519:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4520:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4521:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4522:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4523:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4524:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4525:     PktOptsCond = fun(inet)  -> has_support_ip_pktoptions();
 4526: 		     (inet6) -> has_support_ipv6_pktoptions()
 4527: 		  end,
 4528:     try PktOptsCond(Family) of
 4529: 	true ->
 4530: 	    ?P("pktoptions supported for family ~w", [Family]),
 4531: 	    case OptCond() of
 4532: 		true ->
 4533: 		    ?P("options supported: "
 4534: 		       "~n   ~p", [Spec]),
 4535: 		    test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect);
 4536: 		false ->
 4537: 		    {skip, ?F("Option(s) ~s not supported", [OptStr])}
 4538: 	    end;
 4539:         false ->
 4540:             {skip,
 4541:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4542:     catch
 4543:         _:_:_ ->
 4544:             {skip,
 4545:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4546:     end.
 4547: %%
 4548: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect) ->
 4549:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4550:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4551:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4552:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4553:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4554:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4555:     Timeout = 5000,
 4556:     RecvOpts = [RecvOpt || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4557:     TrueRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,true} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4558:     FalseRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,false} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4559:     Opts = [Opt || {_,Opt,_} <- Spec],
 4560:     OptsVals = [{Opt,Val} || {_,Opt,Val} <- Spec],
 4561:     Address =
 4562:         case Family of
 4563:             inet ->
 4564:                 {127,0,0,1};
 4565:             inet6 ->
 4566:                 {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}
 4567:         end,
 4568:     %%
 4569:     %% Set RecvOpts on listen socket
 4570:     ?P("try create listen socket with: ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4571:     {ok, L} =
 4572:         ?LISTEN(Config, 
 4573:                 0,
 4574:                 [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4575:                  |TrueRecvOpts]),
 4576:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 4577:     ?P("get (recv) options for listen socket: "
 4578:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4579:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4580:     ?P("get options for listen socket: "
 4581:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4582:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4583: 
 4584:     %%
 4585:     %% Set RecvOpts and Option values on connect socket
 4586:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4587:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals]),
 4588:     {ok, S2} =
 4589:         ?CONNECT(Config,
 4590:                  Address, P,
 4591:                  [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4592:                   |TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals],
 4593:                  Timeout),
 4594:     ?P("get (recv) options for connect socket: "
 4595:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4596:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S2, RecvOpts),
 4597:     ?P("get options for connect socket: "
 4598:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4599:     {ok, OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S2, Opts),
 4600: 
 4601:     %%
 4602:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4603:     ?P("try create accept socket"),
 4604:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4605:     ?P("get (recv) options for accept socket: "
 4606:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4607:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S1, RecvOpts),
 4608: 
 4609:     ?P("get options for accept socket: "
 4610:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4611:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S1, Opts),
 4612:     ?P("accept socket option values: "
 4613:        "~n   ~p", [OptsValsDefault]),
 4614: 
 4615: %%%    %%
 4616: %%%    %% Handshake
 4617: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S1, <<"hello">>),
 4618: %%%    {ok,<<"hello">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S2, 5, Timeout),
 4619: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S2, <<"hi">>),
 4620: %%%    {ok,<<"hi">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 2, Timeout),
 4621: 
 4622:     %%
 4623:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4624:     VerifyRemOpts =
 4625:         fun(S, Role) ->
 4626:                 case inet:getopts(S, [pktoptions]) of
 4627:                     {ok, []} ->
 4628:                         ?SKIPT("pktoptions not supported");
 4629:                     {ok, [{pktoptions, PktOpts1}]} ->
 4630:                         ?P("PktOptions (~w): "
 4631:                            "~n      ~p", [Role, PktOpts1]),
 4632:                         PktOpts1;
 4633:                     {ok, UnexpOK1} ->
 4634:                         ?P("Unexpected OK (~w): "
 4635:                            "~n   ~p"
 4636:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpOK1]),
 4637:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_ok,
 4638:                               Role,
 4639:                               Spec,
 4640:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4641:                               OptsVals,
 4642:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4643:                               UnexpOK1});
 4644:                     {error, UnexpERR1} ->
 4645:                         ?P("Unexpected ERROR (~w): "
 4646:                            "~n   ~p"
 4647:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpERR1]),
 4648:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_failure,
 4649:                               Role,
 4650:                               Spec,
 4651:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4652:                               OptsVals,
 4653:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4654:                               UnexpERR1})
 4655:                 end
 4656:         end,
 4657:     ?P("verify dest (accept)"),
 4658:     OptsVals1 = VerifyRemOpts(S1, dest),
 4659:     ?P("verify orig (connect)"),
 4660:     OptsVals2 = VerifyRemOpts(S2, orig),
 4661:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals1}]} = inet:getopts(S1, [pktoptions]),
 4662:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals2}]} = inet:getopts(S2, [pktoptions]),
 4663:     (Result1 = sets_eq(OptsVals1, OptsVals))
 4664:         orelse ?P("Accept differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals1,OptsVals]),
 4665:     (Result2 = sets_eq(OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault))
 4666:         orelse ?P("Connect differs: ~p neq ~p",
 4667:                   [OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault]),
 4668:     %%
 4669:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4670:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S2),
 4671:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4672:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 4673:     %%
 4674:     %%
 4675:     %% Clear RecvOpts on listen socket and set Option values
 4676:     ?P("clear (recv) options on listen socket"),
 4677:     ok = inet:setopts(L, FalseRecvOpts ++ OptsVals),
 4678:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4679:     ?P("set  options on listen socket"),
 4680:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4681: 
 4682:     %%
 4683:     %% Set RecvOpts on connecting socket
 4684:     %%
 4685:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4686:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4687:     {ok,S4} =
 4688:         ?CONNECT(Config, 
 4689:           Address, P,
 4690:           [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4691:           |TrueRecvOpts],
 4692:           Timeout),
 4693:     ?P("get (recv) options on connect socket"),
 4694:     {ok,TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S4, RecvOpts),
 4695:     ?P("get options on connect socket"),
 4696:     {ok,OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S4, Opts),
 4697: 
 4698:     %%
 4699:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4700:     ?P("create accept socket"),
 4701:     {ok,S3} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4702:     ?P("get (recv) options on accept socket"),
 4703:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S3, RecvOpts),
 4704:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S3, Opts),
 4705:     %%
 4706:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4707:     ?P("verify pktoptions on accept socket"),
 4708:     {ok,[{pktoptions,[]}]} = inet:getopts(S3, [pktoptions]),
 4709:     ?P("verify pktoptions on connect socket"),
 4710:     {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals4}]} = inet:getopts(S4, [pktoptions]),
 4711:     ?P("verify options set"),
 4712:     (Result3 = sets_eq(OptsVals4, OptsVals))
 4713:         orelse ?P("Accept2 differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals4, OptsVals]),
 4714:     %%
 4715:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4716:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S4),
 4717:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4718:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S3),
 4719:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 4720:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 4721:     ?P("verify final result"
 4722:        "~n   Result1:       ~p"
 4723:        "~n   Check Connect: ~p"
 4724:        "~n   Result2:       ~p"
 4725:        "~n   Result3:       ~p",
 4726:       [Result1, CheckConnect, Result2, Result3]),
 4727:     (Result1 and ((not CheckConnect) or (Result2 and Result3)))
 4728:         orelse
 4729:         exit({failed,
 4730:               [{OptsVals1,OptsVals4,OptsVals},
 4731:                {OptsVals2,OptsValsDefault}]}),
 4732:     ?P("done"),
 4733:     ok.
 4734: 
 4735: sets_eq(L1, L2) ->
 4736:     lists:sort(L1) == lists:sort(L2).
 4737: 
 4738: 
 4739: 
 4740: %% Accept test utilities (suites are below)
 4741: 
 4742: millis() ->
 4743:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 4744: 
 4745: %% Used when we need to convert system time to milli seconds
 4746: cmillis(T) ->
 4747:     erlang:convert_time_unit(T, native, millisecond).
 4748: 	
 4749: collect_accepts(0, _Tmo) ->
 4750:     ?P("~w(~w) -> done (when rest tmo = ~p)", [?FUNCTION_NAME, 0, _Tmo]),
 4751:     [];
 4752: collect_accepts(N, Tmo) ->
 4753:     A = millis(),
 4754:     receive
 4755: 	{accepted, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}, _} ->
 4756:             ?P("~w(~w) -> ~p unacceptable accept failure: ~p",
 4757:                [?FUNCTION_NAME, N, P, Reason]),
 4758:             ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 4759: 
 4760:         {accepted, P, Msg, Info} ->
 4761:             ?P("~w(~w) -> received accept result from ~p: "
 4762:                "~n   Msg:  ~p"
 4763:                "~n   Info: ~p"
 4764:                "~n      accept time:     ~s"
 4765:                "~n      processing time: ~s",
 4766:                [?FUNCTION_NAME, N, P, Msg, Info,
 4767:                begin
 4768:                    if
 4769:                        is_list(Info) ->
 4770:                            {value, {_, TSTryAccept}} =
 4771:                                lists:keysearch(try_accept, 1, Info),
 4772:                            {value, {_, TSAccept}} =
 4773:                                lists:keysearch(accept, 1, Info),
 4774:                            ?F("~w msec", [TSAccept - TSTryAccept]);
 4775:                        true ->
 4776:                            "ignore"
 4777:                    end
 4778:                end,
 4779:                begin
 4780:                    if
 4781:                        is_list(Info) ->
 4782:                            {value, {_, TSStart}} =
 4783:                                lists:keysearch(start, 1, Info),
 4784:                            {value, {_, TSSent}} =
 4785:                                lists:keysearch(sent, 1, Info),
 4786:                            ?F("~w msec", [TSSent - TSStart]);
 4787:                        true ->
 4788:                            "ignore"
 4789:                    end
 4790:                end]),
 4791:             NextN = if N =:= infinity -> N; true -> N - 1 end,
 4792: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_accepts(NextN, Tmo - (millis()-A))
 4793: 
 4794:     after Tmo ->
 4795:             ?P("~w(~w) -> collection done (~w)", [?FUNCTION_NAME, N, Tmo]),
 4796: 	    []
 4797:     end.
 4798: 
 4799: -define(EXPECT_ACCEPTS(Pattern,N,Timeout),
 4800: 	(fun() ->
 4801:                  ?P("EXPECT_ACCEPTS(~w) -> begin collecting accepts with"
 4802:                     "~n   N:       ~p"
 4803:                     "~n   Timeout: ~p",
 4804:                     [?FUNCTION_NAME, N, Timeout]),
 4805:                  case collect_accepts((N), (Timeout)) of
 4806: 		     Pattern ->
 4807: 			 ok;
 4808: 		     UnexPattern__ ->
 4809: 			 {error, {unexpected, {UnexPattern__, messages()}}}
 4810: 		 end
 4811: 	 end)()).
 4812: 	
 4813: collect_connects(Tmo) ->
 4814:     A = millis(),
 4815:     receive
 4816: 	{connected, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4817:             ?P("~p Failed connect: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4818:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 4819: 
 4820: 	{connected,P,Msg} ->
 4821:             ?P("received connected from ~p: "
 4822:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4823: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_connects(Tmo-(millis() - A))
 4824: 
 4825:     after Tmo ->
 4826: 	    []
 4827:     end.
 4828:    
 4829: -define(EXPECT_CONNECTS(Pattern,Timeout),
 4830: 	(fun() ->
 4831: 		 case collect_connects(Timeout) of
 4832: 		     Pattern ->
 4833: 			 ok;
 4834: 		     Other ->
 4835: 			 {error,{unexpected,Other}}
 4836: 		 end
 4837: 	 end)()).
 4838: 
 4839: mktmofun(Tmo,Parent,LS) ->
 4840:     fun() ->
 4841:             TS0 = millis(),
 4842:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> try accept"),
 4843:             TS1 = millis(),
 4844:             AcceptResult = catch gen_tcp:accept(LS, Tmo),
 4845:             TS2 = millis(),
 4846:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> accept result: "
 4847:                "~n   ~p"
 4848:                "~n   after ~p msec",
 4849:                [AcceptResult, TS2-TS1]),
 4850:             Parent ! {accepted, self(), AcceptResult,
 4851:                       [{start, TS0},
 4852:                        {try_accept, TS1}, {accept, TS2},
 4853:                        {sent, millis()}]}
 4854:     end.
 4855: 
 4856: %% Accept tests
 4857: %% Test singular accept.
 4858: primitive_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4859:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4860:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4861:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4862:                             Addr;
 4863:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4864:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4865:                     end
 4866:            end,
 4867:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) end,
 4868:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4869:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4870: 
 4871: do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4872:     LSock =
 4873:         case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4874:             {ok, LS} ->
 4875:                 LS;
 4876:             {error, LReason} ->
 4877:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 4878:         end,
 4879:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LSock),
 4880:     Parent = self(),
 4881:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LSock)} end,
 4882:     P = spawn(F),
 4883:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4884:         {ok, _} ->
 4885:             ok;
 4886:         {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 4887:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 4888:     end,        
 4889:     receive
 4890:         {accepted,P,{ok,P0}} when is_port(P0) ->
 4891:             ok;
 4892:         {accepted,P,Other0} ->
 4893:             {error,Other0}
 4894:     after 500 ->
 4895:               {error,timeout}
 4896:     end.
 4897: 
 4898: 	
 4899: %% Closing listen socket when multi-accepting.
 4900: multi_accept_close_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4901:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4902:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4903:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4904:                             Addr;
 4905:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4906:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4907:                     end
 4908:            end,
 4909:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) end,
 4910:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4911:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4912: 
 4913: do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) ->
 4914:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
 4915:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4916:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 4917:                  LSocket;
 4918:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4919:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 4920:          end,
 4921:     Parent = self(),
 4922:     F = fun() ->
 4923:                 TS0 = millis(),
 4924:                 ?P("started"),
 4925:                 TS1 = millis(),
 4926:                 Accepted = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 4927:                 TS2 = millis(),
 4928:                 ?P("accept result: "
 4929:                    "~n   ~p"
 4930:                    "~n   after ~p msec",
 4931:                    [Accepted, TS2-TS1]),
 4932:                 Parent ! {accepted,self(),Accepted,
 4933:                           [{start, TS0},
 4934:                            {try_accept, TS1}, {accept, TS2},
 4935:                            {sent, millis()}]}
 4936:         end,
 4937:     ?P("create acceptor processes"),
 4938:     spawn(F),
 4939:     spawn(F),
 4940:     spawn(F),
 4941:     spawn(F),
 4942:     ?P("sleep some"),
 4943:     ct:sleep(?SECS(2)),
 4944:     ?P("close (listen) socket"),
 4945:     gen_tcp:close(LS),
 4946:     ?P("await accepts - expect closed"),
 4947:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}},
 4948:                           {_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}}],4,500),
 4949:     ?P("done"),
 4950:     ok.
 4951:

 4954:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4955:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of

 4959:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4960:                     end
 4961:            end,

 4977:     P = spawn(F),
 4978:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P,{error,timeout}}],1,2000).
 4979: 
 4980: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order.

 4983:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of

 4985:                             Addr;

 4987:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4988:                     end
 4989:            end,
 4990:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeouts_in_order(Config, Addr) end,
 4991:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4992:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4993: 
 4994: do_accept_timeouts_in_order(Config, Addr) ->
 4995:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4996:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 4997:                  LSocket;
 4998:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4999:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5000:          end,

 5003:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(1200,Parent,LS)),
 5004:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(1300,Parent,LS)),
 5005:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(1400,Parent,LS)),
 5006:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P1,{error,timeout}},{P2,{error,timeout}},
 5007:                           {P3,{error,timeout}},{P4,{error,timeout}}],
 5008:                          infinity,2000).

 5083: do_accept_timeouts_in_order4(Config, Addr) ->
 5084:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5085:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5086:                  LSocket;

 5089:          end,

 5092:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),
 5093:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5094:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(600,Parent,LS)),

 5096:                {P2, {error, timeout}},
 5097:                {P4, {error, timeout}},
 5098:                {P3, {error, timeout}}],
 5099:     case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS(Pattern, infinity, 2000) of
 5100:         ok ->
 5101:             ?P("expected pattern"),
 5102:             ok;
 5103:         {error, {unexpected, UnexPattern, Msgs}} ->
 5104:             %% Wrong order?
 5105:             ?P("unexpected: "
 5106:                "~n   Expected:   ~p"
 5107:                "~n   Unexpected: ~p"
 5108:                "~n   Msgs:       ~p", [Pattern, UnexPattern, Msgs]),
 5109:             case lists:keysort(1, Pattern) =:= lists:keysort(1, UnexPattern) of
 5110:                 true ->
 5111:                     %% Yes, wrong order
 5112:                     ct:fail(wrong_order);
 5113:                 false ->
 5114:                     ct:fail(unexpected_result)
 5115:             end
 5116:     end.

 5198: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order after
 5199: %% mixing millsec and sec timeouts (even more++).
 5200: accept_timeouts_in_order7(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5201:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5202:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5203:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5204:                             Addr;
 5205:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5206:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5207:                     end
 5208:            end,
 5209:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeouts_in_order7(Config, Addr) end,
 5210:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5211:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5212: 
 5213: do_accept_timeouts_in_order7(Config, Addr) ->
 5214:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5215:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5216:                  LSocket;
 5217:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5218:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5219:          end,
 5220:     Parent = self(),
 5221:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5222:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(200,Parent,LS)),
 5223:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(1200,Parent,LS)),
 5224:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(600,Parent,LS)),
 5225:     P5 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),
 5226:     P6 = spawn(mktmofun(800,Parent,LS)),
 5227:     P7 = spawn(mktmofun(1600,Parent,LS)),
 5228:     P8 = spawn(mktmofun(1400,Parent,LS)),
 5229:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{error,timeout}},
 5230:                           {P5,{error,timeout}},
 5231: 			  {P4,{error,timeout}},
 5232:                           {P6,{error,timeout}},
 5233: 			  {P1,{error,timeout}},
 5234:                           {P3,{error,timeout}},
 5235: 			  {P8,{error,timeout}},
 5236:                           {P7,{error,timeout}}],
 5237:                          infinity,2000).
 5238: 
 5239: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts behave correctly when
 5240: %% mixed with successful timeouts.
 5241: %% Note that on Windows with inet_backend = socket we 
 5242: %% have *no* control over the accept order!
 5243: accept_timeouts_mixed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5244:     Cond = fun() ->
 5245: 		   is_windows() andalso
 5246: 		       ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 5247: 		       ?SKIPT("Not compat with 'socket of Windows'"),
 5248: 		   ok
 5249: 	   end,
 5250:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5251:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5252:                             Addr;
 5253:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5254:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5255:                     end
 5256:            end,
 5257:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) end,
 5258:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5259:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5260: 
 5261: do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) ->
 5262:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5263:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5264:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5265:                  LSocket;
 5266:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5267:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5268:          end,
 5269:     Parent = self(),
 5270:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5271: 
 5272:     ?P("listen socket"
 5273:        "~n   ~p"
 5274:        "~n   Port: ~p", [LS, PortNo]),
 5275: 
 5276:     ?P("create acceptor process 1 (with timeout 1000)"),
 5277:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5278: 
 5279:     ?P("await 1 (~p) accepting", [P1]),
 5280:     wait_until_accepting(P1,500),
 5281: 
 5282:     ?P("create acceptor process 2 (with timeout 2000)"),
 5283:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(2000,Parent,LS)),
 5284: 
 5285:     ?P("await 2 (~p) accepting", [P2]),
 5286:     wait_until_accepting(P2,500),
 5287: 
 5288:     ?P("create acceptor process 3 (with timeout 3000)"),
 5289:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(3000,Parent,LS)),
 5290: 
 5291:     ?P("await 3 (~p) accepting", [P3]),
 5292:     wait_until_accepting(P3,500),
 5293: 
 5294:     ?P("create acceptor process 4 (with timeout 4000)"),
 5295:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(4000,Parent,LS)),
 5296: 
 5297:     ?P("await 4 (~p) accepting", [P4]),
 5298:     wait_until_accepting(P4,500),
 5299: 
 5300:     ?P("expect accept from 1 (~p) with timeout", [P1]),
 5301:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P1,{error,timeout}}],infinity,1500),
 5302: 
 5303:     ?P("connect"),
 5304:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5305:         {ok, _} ->
 5306:             ok;
 5307:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 5308:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 5309:     end,
 5310: 
 5311:     ?P("expect accept from 2 (~p) with success", [P2]),
 5312:     if
 5313:         is_port(LS) ->
 5314:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,Port0}}] when is_port(Port0),
 5315:                                                         infinity,100);
 5316:         true ->
 5317:             case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,_}}],infinity,100) of
 5318: 		ok ->
 5319: 		    ok;
 5320: 		{error, Reason2} ->
 5321: 		    ?P("Failed accept: "
 5322: 		       "~n   P2:     ~p"
 5323: 		       "~n   Reason: ~p", [P2, Reason2]),
 5324: 		    ct:fail(unexpected_accepts)
 5325: 	    end
 5326:     end,
 5327: 
 5328:     ?P("expect accept from 3 (~p) with timeout", [P3]),
 5329:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P3,{error,timeout}}],infinity,2000),
 5330: 
 5331:     ?P("connect"),
 5332:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5333:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason3} ->
 5334:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason3));
 5335:         _  ->
 5336:             ok
 5337:     end,
 5338: 
 5339:     ?P("expect accept from 4 (~p) with success", [P4]),
 5340:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5341:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,Port1}}] when is_port(Port1),
 5342:                                                         infinity,100);
 5343:        true ->
 5344:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,_Port1}}],infinity,100)
 5345:     end,
 5346: 
 5347:     ?P("done"),
 5348:     ok.
 5349: 
 5350: %% Check that single acceptor behaves as expected when killed.
 5351: killing_acceptor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5352:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5353:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5354:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5355:                             Addr;
 5356:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5357:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5358:                     end
 5359:            end,
 5360:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) end,
 5361:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5362:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5363: 
 5364: do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) ->
 5365:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5366:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5367:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5368:             do_killing_acceptor_inet(LSocket);
 5369:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5370:             do_killing_acceptor_socket(LSocket);
 5371:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5372:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5373:     end,
 5374:     ?P("done"),
 5375:     ok.
 5376: 
 5377: do_killing_acceptor_inet(LS) ->
 5378:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5379:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5380: 
 5381:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5382:     Pid = spawn(
 5383:             fun() ->
 5384:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5385:             end),
 5386:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5387:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5388:     end,
 5389: 
 5390:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5391:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5392: 
 5393:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5394:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5395:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5396:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5397:     end,
 5398: 
 5399:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5400:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5401: 
 5402:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5403:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5404:     ok.
 5405: 
 5406: do_killing_acceptor_socket(LS) ->
 5407:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5408:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5409: 
 5410:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5411:     Pid = spawn(
 5412:             fun() ->
 5413:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5414:             end),
 5415:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5416:     ct:sleep(100),
 5417: 
 5418:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5419:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5420: 
 5421:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5422:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5423:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5424:     ct:sleep(1000),
 5425: 
 5426:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5427:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5428: 
 5429:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5430:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5431:     ok.
 5432:     
 5433: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpStates, ExpNotStates) when is_port(LS) ->
 5434:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5435:         #{states := States} ->
 5436: 
 5437:             ?P("try validate (listen socket) state when: "
 5438:                "~n   Exp States:     ~p"
 5439:                "~n   Exp Not States: ~p"
 5440:                "~n   States:         ~p", [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5441: 
 5442:             %% State *shall* contain ExpStates => States1 =/= States
 5443:             States1 = States -- ExpStates,
 5444: 
 5445:             %% State shall *not* contain ExpNotStates => States2 =:= States
 5446:             States2 = States -- ExpNotStates,
 5447: 
 5448:             if
 5449:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5450:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5451:                     ?P("validated: "
 5452:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5453:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5454:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates]),
 5455:                     ok;
 5456:                true ->
 5457:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5458:                        "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5459:                        "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5460:                        "~n   States:              ~p",
 5461:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5462:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5463:             end;
 5464: 
 5465:         InvalidInfo ->
 5466:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5467:                "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5468:                "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5469:                "~n   Invalid Info:        ~p",
 5470:                [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, InvalidInfo]),
 5471:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5472:     end.
 5473: 
 5474: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, ExpNotState) ->
 5475:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5476:         #{num_acceptors := ExpNumAcc, rstates := States} ->
 5477:             ?P("try validate state when: "
 5478:                "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5479:                "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5480:                "~n   RStates:            ~p", [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5481: 
 5482:             %% States *shall* contain ExpState => States1 =/= States
 5483:             States1 = States -- ExpState,
 5484:             
 5485:             %% States shall *not* contain ExpNotState => States2 =:= States
 5486:             States2 = States -- ExpNotState,
 5487: 
 5488:             if
 5489:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5490:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5491:                     ?P("validated: "
 5492:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5493:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5494:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState]),
 5495:                     ok;
 5496:                true ->
 5497:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5498:                        "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5499:                        "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5500:                        "~n   States:             ~p",
 5501:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5502:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5503:             end;
 5504: 
 5505:         #{num_acceptors := NumAcc, rstates := RStates, wstates := WStates} ->
 5506:             ?P("invalid state: "
 5507:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5508:                "~n   Num Acceptors:          ~w"
 5509:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5510:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5511:                "~n   RStates:                ~p"
 5512:                "~n   WStates:                ~p",
 5513:                [ExpNumAcc, NumAcc, ExpState, RStates, WStates]),
 5514:             ct:fail("Invalid state");
 5515: 
 5516:         InvalidInfo ->
 5517:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5518:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5519:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5520:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5521:                "~n   Invalid Info:           ~p",
 5522:                [ExpNumAcc, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, InvalidInfo]),
 5523:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5524:     end.
 5525:     
 5526: 
 5527: %% Check that multi acceptors behaves as expected when killed.
 5528: killing_multi_acceptors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5529:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5530:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5531:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5532:                             Addr;
 5533:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5534:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5535:                     end
 5536:            end,
 5537:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) end,
 5538:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5539:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5540: 
 5541: do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) ->
 5542:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5543:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5544:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5545:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LSocket);
 5546:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5547:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LSocket);
 5548:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5549:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5550:     end,
 5551:     ?P("done"),
 5552:     ok.
 5553: 
 5554: do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LS) ->
 5555:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5556:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5557: 
 5558:     Parent = self(),
 5559:     F1  = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5560:     Tmo = 1000,
 5561:     F2  = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5562:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5563:     Pid1 = spawn(F1),
 5564:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5565:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5566: 
 5567:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5568:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5569: 
 5570:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5571:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5572: 
 5573:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5574:     exit(Pid1, kill),
 5575: 
 5576:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5577:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5578: 
 5579:     ?P("validate state - still accepting"),
 5580:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5581: 
 5582:     ?P("await second acceptor exit (timeout)"),
 5583:     %% In order to avoid race condition, double the time
 5584:     case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2, {error,timeout}}], 1, 2 * Tmo) of
 5585: 	ok ->
 5586: 	    ?P("second acceptor - expected result"),
 5587: 	    ok;
 5588: 	Any ->
 5589: 	    ?P("second acceptor - failed:"
 5590: 	       "~n      ~p", [Any]),
 5591: 	    %% Check what Pid2 is doing
 5592: 	    Pid2Info1 = process_info(Pid2),
 5593: 	    Pid2Msgs1 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5594: 	    %% Check if this is just a race...
 5595: 	    ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5596: 	    Pid2Info2 = process_info(Pid2),
 5597: 	    Pid2Msgs2 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5598: 	    ?P("second acceptor failed - check ~p"
 5599: 	       "~n      Info 1: ~p"
 5600: 	       "~n      Msgs 1: ~p"
 5601: 	       "~n   After 1 sec sleep:"
 5602: 	       "~n      Info 2: ~p"
 5603: 	       "~n      Msgs 2: ~p",
 5604: 	       [Pid2, Pid2Info1, Pid2Msgs1, Pid2Info2, Pid2Msgs2]),
 5605: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_accepts, Any})
 5606:     end,
 5607: 
 5608:     ?P("validate state - *not* accepting"),
 5609:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5610: 
 5611:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5612:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5613:     ok.
 5614: 
 5615: do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LS) ->
 5616:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5617:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5618: 
 5619:     Parent = self(),
 5620:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5621:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5622:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5623:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5624:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5625:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5626: 
 5627:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5628:     ct:sleep(100),
 5629: 
 5630:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5631:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 2, [accepting], []),
 5632: 
 5633:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5634:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5635:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5636:     ct:sleep(100),
 5637: 
 5638:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5639:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5640: 
 5641:     ?P("await second acceptor exit - timeout"),
 5642:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2,{error,timeout}}],1,1000),
 5643: 
 5644:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5645:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5646: 
 5647:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5648:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5649:     ok.
 5650: 
 5651: 
 5652: %% Check that multi acceptors behaves as expected when killed (more).
 5653: killing_multi_acceptors2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5654:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5655:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5656:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5657:                             Addr;
 5658:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5659:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5660:                     end
 5661:            end,
 5662:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_multi_acceptors2(Config, Addr) end,
 5663:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5664:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5665: 
 5666: do_killing_multi_acceptors2(Config, Addr) ->
 5667:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5668:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5669:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5670:             do_killing_multi_acceptors2_inet(Config, LSocket);
 5671:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5672:             do_killing_multi_acceptors2_socket(Config, LSocket);
 5673:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5674:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5675:     end,
 5676:     ?P("done"),
 5677:     ok.
 5678: 
 5679: do_killing_multi_acceptors2_inet(Config, LS) ->
 5680:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5681:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5682: 
 5683:     Parent = self(),
 5684:     ?P("get port number for listen socket"),
 5685:     {ok, {Addr, PortNo}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5686: 
 5687:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5688:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5689: 
 5690:     ?P("create acceptor process 1"),
 5691:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5692:     ?P("create acceptor process 2"),
 5693:     Pid2 = spawn(F),
 5694:     ?P("wait some"),
 5695:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5696:     end,
 5697: 
 5698:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5699:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5700: 
 5701:     ?P("kill acceptor 1"),
 5702:     exit(Pid,kill),
 5703: 
 5704:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5705:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5706:     end,
 5707: 
 5708:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5709:     {ok, L2} = prim_inet:getstatus(LS),
 5710:     true  = lists:member(accepting, L2),
 5711: 
 5712:     ?P("kill acceptor 2"),
 5713:     exit(Pid2, kill),
 5714: 
 5715:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5716:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5717:     end,
 5718: 
 5719:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5720:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5721: 
 5722:     ?P("create acceptor 3"),
 5723:     Pid3 = spawn(F2),
 5724: 
 5725:     ?P("wait some"),
 5726:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5727:     end,
 5728: 
 5729:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5730:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5731: 
 5732:     ?P("connect to port ~p", [PortNo]),
 5733:     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]),
 5734: 
 5735:     ?P("await accept"),
 5736:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid3,{ok,CSock}}] when is_port(CSock),1,100),
 5737: 
 5738:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5739:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5740: 
 5741:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5742:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5743:     ok.
 5744: 
 5745: do_killing_multi_acceptors2_socket(Config, LS) ->
 5746:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5747:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5748: 
 5749:     Parent = self(),
 5750:     ?P("get port number for listen socket"),
 5751:     {ok, {Addr, PortNo}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5752: 
 5753:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5754:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5755: 
 5756:     ?P("create acceptor process 1"),
 5757:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5758:     ?P("create acceptor process 2"),
 5759:     Pid2 = spawn(F),
 5760: 
 5761:     ?P("wait some"),
 5762:     ct:sleep(100),
 5763: 
 5764:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5765:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 2, [accepting], []),
 5766: 
 5767:     ?P("kill acceptor 1"),
 5768:     exit(Pid,kill),
 5769: 
 5770:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5771:     ct:sleep(100),
 5772: 
 5773:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5774:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5775: 
 5776:     ?P("kill acceptor 2"),
 5777:     exit(Pid2, kill),
 5778: 
 5779:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5780:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5781:     end,
 5782: 
 5783:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5784:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5785: 
 5786:     ?P("create acceptor 3"),
 5787:     Pid3 = spawn(F2),
 5788: 
 5789:     ?P("wait some"),
 5790:     ct:sleep(100),
 5791: 
 5792:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5793:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5794: 
 5795:     ?P("connect to port ~p", [PortNo]),
 5796:     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]),
 5797: 
 5798:     ?P("await accept"),
 5799:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid3,{ok, _CSock}}],1,100),
 5800: 
 5801:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5802:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5803: 
 5804:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5805:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5806:     ok.
 5807: 
 5808: 
 5809: %% Checks that multi-accept works when more than one accept can be
 5810: %% done at once (wb test of inet_driver).
 5811: several_accepts_in_one_go(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5812:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5813:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5814:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5815:                             Addr;
 5816:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5817:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5818:                     end
 5819:            end,
 5820:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) end,
 5821:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5822:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5823: 
 5824: do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) ->
 5825:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5826:     NumActors = 8,
 5827:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {backlog, NumActors}]) of
 5828:              {ok, LSock} ->
 5829:                  LSock;
 5830:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5831:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5832:          end,
 5833:     Parent = self(),
 5834:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5835:     F1 = fun() ->
 5836: 		 ?P("acceptor starting"),
 5837: 		 Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS),ignore}
 5838:          end,
 5839:     F2 = fun() ->
 5840: 		 ?P("connector starting"),
 5841: 		 Parent ! {connected,self(),
 5842:                            ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}])}
 5843:          end,
 5844:     Ns = lists:seq(1, NumActors),
 5845:     ?P("start acceptors"),
 5846:     _  = [spawn(F1) || _ <- Ns],
 5847:     ?P("await accept timeouts"),
 5848:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([],1,500), % wait for tmo
 5849:     ?P("start connectors"),
 5850:     _  = [spawn(F2) || _ <- Ns],
 5851:     ?P("await accepts"),
 5852:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],NumActors,15000),
 5853:     ?P("await connects"),
 5854:     ok = ?EXPECT_CONNECTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],1000),
 5855:     ?P("done"),
 5856:     ok.
 5857: 
 5858: flush(Msgs) ->
 5859:     erlang:yield(),
 5860:     receive Msg -> flush([Msg|Msgs])
 5861:     after     0 -> lists:reverse(Msgs)
 5862:     end.
 5863: 
 5864: wait_until_accepting(Proc,0) ->
 5865:     exit({timeout_waiting_for_accepting,Proc});
 5866: wait_until_accepting(Proc,N) ->
 5867:     case process_info(Proc,current_function) of
 5868:         {current_function, {prim_inet, accept0, 3}} ->
 5869:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5870:                 {status,waiting} ->
 5871: 		    ?P("[prim_inet] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5872:                     ok;
 5873:                 _O1 ->
 5874:                     receive 
 5875:                     after 5 ->
 5876:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5877:                     end
 5878:             end;
 5879:         {current_function, {gen, do_call, 4}} ->
 5880:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5881:                 {status,waiting} -> 
 5882: 		    ?P("[gen] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5883:                     ok;
 5884:                 _O1 ->
 5885:                     receive 
 5886:                     after 5 ->
 5887:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5888:                     end
 5889:             end;
 5890:         _O2 ->
 5891:             receive 
 5892:             after 5 ->
 5893:                     wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5894:             end
 5895:     end.
 5896: 
 5897: 
 5898: %% Check that accept returns {error, system_limit}
 5899: %% (and not {error, enfile}) when running out of ports.
 5900: accept_system_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5901:     Cond = fun() ->
 5902: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 5903: 		       true ->
 5904: 			   {skip, "Not compliant with socket"};
 5905: 		       false ->
 5906: 			   ok
 5907: 		   end
 5908: 	   end,
 5909:     TC   = fun() -> do_accept_system_limit(Config) end,
 5910:     ?TC_TRY(accept_system_limit, Cond, TC).
 5911: 
 5912: do_accept_system_limit(Config) ->
 5913:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5914:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, []) of
 5915:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5916:                  LSocket;
 5917:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5918:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5919:         end,             
 5920:     {ok, {Addr, Port}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5921:     ?P("listen socket \"bound\" to:"
 5922:        "~n      Address: ~p"
 5923:        "~n      Port:    ~p", [Addr, Port]),
 5924:     Me = self(),
 5925:     ?P("create connector"),
 5926:     Connector = spawn_link(fun() ->
 5927:                                    connector(Config, Port, Me)
 5928:                            end),
 5929:     ?P("sync with connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5930:     receive {Connector, sync} -> Connector ! {self(), continue} end,
 5931:     ?P("begin accepting"),
 5932:     ok = acceptor(Connector, LS, false, []),
 5933:     ?P("stop connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5934:     Connector ! stop,
 5935:     ?P("done"),
 5936:     ok.
 5937: 
 5938: acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, A) ->
 5939:     case gen_tcp:accept(LS, 1000) of
 5940:         {ok, S} ->
 5941:             acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, [S|A]);
 5942:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5943:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 5944:         {error, system_limit} ->
 5945:             ?P("acceptor: "
 5946:                "system limit => *almost* done (~w)", [length(A)]),
 5947:             acceptor(Connector, LS, true, A);
 5948:         {error, timeout} when GotSL ->
 5949:             ?P("acceptor: timeout (with system limit) => done (~w)",
 5950:                [length(A)]),
 5951:             ok;
 5952:         {error, timeout} ->
 5953:             ?P("acceptor: timeout *without* system limit => failure"
 5954:                "~n     Number of Accepted: ~w",
 5955:                [length(A)]),
 5956:             error
 5957:     end.
 5958: 
 5959: connector(Config, AccPort, Tester) ->
 5960:     ?P("[connector] start"),
 5961:     ManyPorts = open_ports([]),
 5962:     ?P("[connector] length(ManyPorts): ~p", [length(ManyPorts)]),
 5963:     Tester ! {self(), sync},
 5964:     ?P("[connector] await continute from tester (~p)", [Tester]),
 5965:     receive {Tester, continue} -> timer:sleep(100) end,
 5966:     ?P("[connector] begin connecting"),
 5967:     ConnF =
 5968:         fun(Port) ->
 5969:                 case (catch ?CONNECT(Config, {127,0,0,1}, AccPort)) of
 5970:                     {ok, Sock} ->
 5971:                         ?P("[connector] success: "
 5972:                            "~n      ~p", [Sock]),
 5973:                         Sock;
 5974:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5975:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 5976:                     _Error ->
 5977:                         ?P("[connector] failure: "
 5978:                            "~n      ~p", [_Error]),
 5979:                         port_close(Port)
 5980:                 end
 5981:         end,
 5982:     R = [ConnF(Port) || Port <- lists:sublist(ManyPorts, 10)],
 5983:     ?P("[connector] await stop"),
 5984:     receive stop -> ?P("[connector] stop (~w)", [length(R)]), R end.
 5985: 
 5986: open_ports(L) ->
 5987:     case catch open_port({spawn_driver, "ram_file_drv"}, []) of
 5988: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 5989: 	    open_ports([Port|L]);
 5990: 	{'EXIT', {system_limit, _}} ->
 5991: 	    {L1, L2} = lists:split(5, L),
 5992: 	    [port_close(Port) || Port <- L1],
 5993: 	    L2
 5994:     end.
 5995:

 5997: %% Check that active once and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 5998: active_once_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5999:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6000:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6001:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6002:                             Addr;
 6003:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6004:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6005:                     end
 6006:            end,
 6007:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 6008:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6009:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6010: 
 6011: do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 6012:     Send = fun(Socket, Data) ->
 6013:                    case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 6014:                        {error, #{info := econnaborted}} ->
 6015:                            {error, econnaborted};
 6016:                        X ->
 6017:                            X
 6018:                    end
 6019:            end,
 6020:     ?P("stage 1"),
 6021:     (fun() ->
 6022: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin setup"),
 6023: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 6024: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin send"),
 6025: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 6026:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 6027: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 6028: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A, [{active,once}]),
 6029: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed"),
 6030: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 6031: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 6032: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 6033: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 6034: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 6035: 	     ?P("[stage1] done"),
 6036: 	     ok
 6037:      end)(),
 6038:     ?P("stage 2"),
 6039:     (fun() ->
 6040: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin setup"),
 6041: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 6042: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin send"),
 6043: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 6044:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 6045: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect success"),
 6046: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 6047: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed"),
 6048: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 6049: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 6050: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 6051: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 6052: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 6053: 	     ?P("[stage2] done"),
 6054: 	     ok
 6055:      end)(),
 6056:     ?P("stage 3"),
 6057:     (fun() ->
 6058: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin setup"),
 6059: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 6060: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin send"),
 6061: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 6062:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 6063: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:true => expect success"),
 6064: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 6065: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed"),
 6066: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 6067: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 6068: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 6069: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 6070: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 6071: 	     ?P("[stage3] done"),
 6072: 	     ok
 6073:      end)(),
 6074:     ?P("stage 4"),
 6075:     (fun() ->
 6076: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin setup"),
 6077: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 6078: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin send"),
 6079: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 6080: 			fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 6081: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 6082: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 6083: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed"),
 6084: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 6085: 	     ?P("[stage4] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 6086: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 6087: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 6088: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 6089: 	     ?P("[stage4] done"),
 6090: 	     ok
 6091:      end)(),
 6092:     ?P("stage 5"),
 6093:     (fun() ->
 6094: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin setup"),
 6095: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 6096: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin send"),
 6097: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 6098: 			fun() -> Send(A,"Hello") end),
 6099: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:false => expect success"),
 6100: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,false}]),
 6101: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed => expect timeout"),
 6102: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 6103: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:once => expect success"),
 6104: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 6105: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed"),
 6106: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 6107: 	     ?P("[stage5] done"),
 6108: 	     ok
 6109:      end)(),
 6110:     ?P("done"),
 6111:     ok.
 6112: 
 6113: %% Check that active n and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 6114: active_n_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6115:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6116:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6117:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6118:                             Addr;
 6119:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6120:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6121:                     end
 6122:            end,
 6123:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 6124:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6125:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6126: 
 6127: do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 6128:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 6129:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 6130: 
 6131:     P = self(),
 6132: 
 6133:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6134: 
 6135:     ClientF =
 6136:         fun() ->
 6137:                 ?P("[client] started"),
 6138:                 Payload = <<0:50000/unit:8>>,
 6139:                 Cnt = 10000,
 6140:                 ?P("[client] send size"),
 6141:                 P ! {size, Cnt * byte_size(Payload)},
 6142:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 6143:                 S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6144:                                   [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 6145:                         {ok, CS} ->
 6146:                             ?P("[client] connected"),
 6147:                             P ! {continue, self()},
 6148:                             CS;
 6149:                         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 6150:                             ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 6151:                     end,
 6152:                 ?P("[client] send payload"),
 6153:                 _ = [gen_tcp:send(S, Payload) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Cnt)],
 6154:                 ?P("[client] close socket"),
 6155:                 gen_tcp:close(S),
 6156:                 ?P("[client] done"),
 6157:                 exit(ok)
 6158:         end,
 6159:     ?P("create client process"),
 6160:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(ClientF),
 6161: 
 6162:     ?P("await size"),
 6163:     receive {size, SendSize} -> SendSize end,
 6164:     ?P("await continue or down"),
 6165:     receive
 6166:         {continue, Pid} ->
 6167:             ?P("got continue"),
 6168:             ok;
 6169:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 6170:             ?P("got *unexpected* skip"),
 6171:             gen_tcp:close(L),
 6172:             throw(SKIP);
 6173:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ConnectRes} ->
 6174:             ?P("got *unexpected* crash: "
 6175:               "~n   ~p", [ConnectRes]),
 6176:             exit({unexpected, connect, ConnectRes})
 6177:     end,
 6178:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6179:     inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6180:     ?P("start collecting data"),
 6181:     RecvSize = anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef),
 6182: 
 6183:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 6184:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 6185: 
 6186:     ?P("validate size"),
 6187:     if SendSize =:= RecvSize ->
 6188:             ?P("done"),
 6189:             ok;
 6190:        true ->
 6191:             ct:fail("Send and Recv size not equal: ~p ~p", [SendSize, RecvSize])
 6192:     end.
 6193: 
 6194: 
 6195: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef) ->
 6196:     anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, 0, false, false).
 6197: 
 6198: anc_await_closed_and_down(_S, _Pid, _MRef, Size, true, true) ->
 6199:     Size;
 6200: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down) ->
 6201:     receive
 6202:         {tcp, S, Bin} ->
 6203:             %% ?P("got a chunk (~w) of data", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 6204:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef,
 6205:                                       byte_size(Bin) + Size, Closed, Down);
 6206:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 6207:             ?P("got closed -> we are done: ~w", [Size]),
 6208:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, true, Down);
 6209:         {tcp_passive, S} ->
 6210:             %% ?P("got passive -> active"),
 6211:             inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6212:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6213:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ok} ->
 6214:             ?P("Received expected down message regarding client"),
 6215:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6216: 
 6217:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 6218:             ?P("Received UNEXPECTED down message regarding client:"
 6219:                "~n   Reason:    ~p"
 6220:                "~n   Port Info: ~p",
 6221:                [Reason, (catch erlang:port_info(S))]),
 6222:             ct:fail({unexpected_client_down, Reason}); 
 6223: 
 6224:        Msg ->
 6225:             ?P("ignore: ~p", [Msg]),
 6226:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down)
 6227:     end.
 6228:

 6230: send_timeout_cfg(Config) ->
 6231:     send_timeout_cfg(Config, default).
 6232: 
 6233: send_timeout_cfg(Config, Case) ->
 6234:     case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6235:         true when (Case =:= send_timeout_check_length) ->
 6236:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   5*1024};
 6237:         true ->
 6238:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 10*1024),  5*1024};
 6239:         false ->
 6240:             {1,   1000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   16*1024}
 6241:     end.
