 6243: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6244: send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6245:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6246:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6247:                    ?P("create node"),

 6249: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6250:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6251:            end,

 6253:                    do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6254:            end,
 6255:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6256:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6257:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6258:            end,
 6259:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).

 6269: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6270: send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6271:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6272:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6273:                    ?P("create node"),
 6274:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6275: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6276:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6277:            end,
 6278:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6279:                    do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6280:            end,
 6281:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6282:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6283:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6284:            end,
 6285:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6286: 
 6287: do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6288:     ?P("begin"),
 6289:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6290:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose),
 6291:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6292: 		       true, RNode),
 6293:     ?P("done"),
 6294:     ok.
 6295: 
 6296: send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6297: 		   AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6298:     ?P("[basic] sink"),
 6299:     {A, Pid}              = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6300:                                                Addr, SndTimeout,
 6301:                                                AutoClose, SndBuf),
 6302:     Send                  = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6303:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout),
 6304: 
 6305:     %% Check that the socket is not busy/closed...
 6306:     ?P("[basic] verify socket not busy/closed"),
 6307:     case gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) of
 6308: 	{error, Reason} ->
 6309: 	    ?P("[basic] (expected) send failure"),
 6310: 	    after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason),
 6311: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6312: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6313: 	    ok;
 6314: 	ok ->
 6315:             %% Note that there is no active reader on the other end,
 6316:             %% so a 'channel' has been filled, should remain filled.
 6317: 	    ?P("[basic] UNEXPECTED send success"),
 6318: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6319: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6320: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected send success")
 6321:     end.
 6322: 
 6323: 
 6324: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6325: send_timeout_check_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6326:     Cond = fun() ->
 6327:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6328:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6329:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6330:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6331:                        _ ->
 6332:                            ok
 6333:                    end
 6334:            end,
 6335:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6336:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6337:                    ?P("create node"),
 6338:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6339: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6340:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6341:            end,
 6342:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6343:                    do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, Node)
 6344:            end,
 6345:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6346:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6347:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6348:            end,
 6349:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6350: 
 6351: do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6352:     ?P("begin"),
 6353:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6354:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_check_length),
 6355: 
 6356:     %% Check timeout length.
 6357:     ?P("spawn sink process (check timeout length)"),
 6358:     Self = self(),
 6359:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(
 6360:                    fun() ->
 6361:                            {A, _} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6362: 						       Addr, SndTimeout,
 6363:                                                        true, SndBuf),
 6364:                            Send = fun() ->
 6365:                                           %% <TMP>
 6366:                                           %% snmp:enable_trace(),
 6367:                                           %% snmp:set_trace([{gen_tcp_socket,
 6368:                                           %%                  [{scope, send}]},
 6369:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,getopt}]},
 6370:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,send}]}],
 6371:                                           %%                [{timestamp, true},
 6372:                                           %%                 {return_trace, true}]),
 6373:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 6374:                                           Res = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6375:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 6376:                                           %% snmp:disable_trace(),
 6377:                                           %% </TMP>
 6378:                                           Self ! Res,
 6379:                                           Res
 6380:                                   end,
 6381:                            {{error, timeout}, _} =
 6382: 			       timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)
 6383:                    end),
 6384:     Diff = get_max_diff(Pid),
 6385:     ?P("Max time for send: ~p", [Diff]),
 6386:     true = (Diff > (SndTimeout - 500)) and (Diff < (SndTimeout + 500)),
 6387: 
 6388:     %% Wait for the process to die.
 6389:     ?P("await (timeout checker) process death"),
 6390:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, _} -> ok end,
 6391: 
 6392:     ?P("done"),
 6393:     ok.

 6398:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6399:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6400:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6401:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6402:                        _ ->
 6403:                            ok
 6404:                    end

 6415: 	   end,

 6423:     ?P("begin"),

 6425: 
 6426:     %% Check that parallel writers do not hang forever
 6427:     ?P("check parallel writers wo autoclose"),
 6428:     send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6429: 		      false, RNode),

 6434: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6435: %% send_timeout/send_timeout_close behaves differently on 
 6436: %% inet_backend 'socket' (compared to inet), so we skip
 6437: %% this test case (until we can re-write).
 6438: send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6439:     Cond = fun() ->
 6440:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6441:                        true ->
 6442:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 6443:                        false ->
 6444:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 6445:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6446:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6447:                                    {skip,
 6448:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6449:                                _ ->
 6450:                                    ok
 6451:                            end
 6452:                    end
 6453:            end,
 6454:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6455:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6456:                    ?P("create node"),
 6457:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6458: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6459:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6460:            end,
 6461:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6462:                    do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6463:            end,
 6464:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6465:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6466:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6467:            end,

 6470: do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6471:     ?P("begin"),
 6472:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6473:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_para_w_autoclose),
 6474: 
 6475:     %% Check that parallel writers do not hang forever
 6476:     ?P("check parallel writers wo autoclose"),
 6477:     send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6478: 		      true, RNode),
 6479:
