 6481:     ok.
 6482: 
 6483: send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, BufSz, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6484: 		  AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6485:     ?P("[para] sink -> entry with"
 6486:        "~n      size(BinData): ~p"
 6487:        "~n      BufSz:         ~p"
 6488:        "~n      SndTimeout:    ~p"
 6489:        "~n      AutoClose:     ~p",
 6490:        [byte_size(BinData), BufSz, SndTimeout, AutoClose]),
 6491:     {A, Pid} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6492:                                   Addr, SndTimeout, AutoClose, BufSz),
 6493:     Self = self(),
 6494:     SenderFun = fun() ->
 6495:                         ?P("[para:sender] starting"),
 6496: 			Send = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6497: 			Self ! {self(), timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)}
 6498: 		end,
 6499:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 1"),
 6500:     Snd1 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6501:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 2"),
 6502:     Snd2 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6503: 
 6504:     SockInfo    = fun() -> (catch inet:info(A)) end,
 6505:     SockTimeout = fun() ->
 6506:                           try inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout]) of
 6507:                               {ok, [V2]} ->
 6508:                                   V2;
 6509:                               {error, R2} ->
 6510:                                   ?F("ERROR: ~p", [R2]);
 6511:                               X2 ->
 6512:                                   ?F("UNKNOWN: ~p", [X2])
 6513:                           catch
 6514:                               C2:E2:S2 ->
 6515:                                   ?F("CAUGHT: ~p, ~p, ~p", [C2, E2, S2])
 6516:                           end
 6517:                   end,
 6518: 
 6519:     ?P("[para] await first sender timeout when"
 6520:        "~n   Sender 1: ~p"
 6521:        "~n   Sender 2: ~p", [Snd1, Snd2]),
 6522:     First =
 6523:         receive
 6524:             {Snd1, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6525:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)", [Snd1, N]),
 6526:                 1;
 6527:             {Snd2, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6528:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)", [Snd2, N]),
 6529:                 2;
 6530: 
 6531:             {'EXIT', _Pid, {timetrap_timeout, _Timeout, _Stack}} ->
 6532:                 %% The test case (timetrap) has timed out, which either means
 6533:                 %% we are running on very slow hw or some system functions
 6534:                 %% are slowing us down (this test case should never normally
 6535:                 %% time out like this).
 6536:                 ?P("Test case timetrap timeout - check for system events"),
 6537:                 case kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events(?SECS(5)) of
 6538:                     SysEvs when (SysEvs =/= []) ->
 6539:                         ?P("timetrap timeout with system events: "
 6540:                            "~n   System Events: ~p"
 6541:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6542:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6543:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6544:                            [SysEvs,
 6545:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6546:                             SockInfo()]),
 6547:                         ?SKIPT(?F("TC system ~w events", [length(SysEvs)]));
 6548:                     {error, Reason} ->
 6549:                         ?P("TC timetrap timeout but failed get system events: "
 6550:                            "~n   Reason:        ~p"
 6551:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6552:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6553:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6554:                            [Reason,
 6555:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6556:                             SockInfo()]),
 6557:                         exit({timetrap, {failed_get_sys_evs, Reason}});
 6558:                     [] ->
 6559:                         ?P("TC timetrap *without* system events: "
 6560:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6561:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6562:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6563:                            [process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6564:                             SockInfo()]),
 6565:                         exit(timetrap)
 6566:                 end
 6567: 
 6568:         after 20000 ->
 6569:                 SockInfo1 = SockInfo(),
 6570:                 SockTo1   = SockTimeout(),
 6571:                 ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(1,~w) when:"
 6572:                    "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6573:                    "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6574:                    "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6575:                    "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6576:                    "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6577:                    [AutoClose,
 6578:                     (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6579:                     (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6580:                     SockInfo1, SockTo1,
 6581:                     flush([])]),
 6582:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6583:                 Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6584:                 ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6585:                 exit({timeout, AutoClose})
 6586:         end,
 6587: 
 6588:     Second = if (First =:= 1) -> 2; true -> 1 end,
 6589:     ?P("[para] await second sender ~w error", [Second]),
 6590:     receive
 6591: 	{Snd1, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6592:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)",
 6593:                [Error_1, Snd1, N_1]),
 6594:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1);
 6595: 	{Snd2, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6596:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)",
 6597:                [Error_1, Snd2, N_1]),
 6598:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1)
 6599:     after 10000 ->
 6600:             if (Second =:= 1) ->
 6601:                     SockInfo21 = SockInfo(),
 6602:                     SockTo21   = SockTimeout(),
 6603:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6604:                        "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6605:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6606:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6607:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6608:                        [AutoClose,
 6609:                         (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6610:                         SockInfo21, SockTo21,
 6611:                         flush([])]),
 6612:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout};
 6613:                true ->
 6614:                     SockInfo22 = SockInfo(),
 6615:                     SockTo22   = SockTimeout(),
 6616:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6617:                        "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6618:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6619:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6620:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6621:                        [AutoClose,
 6622:                         (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6623:                         SockInfo22, SockTo22,
 6624:                         flush([])]),
 6625:                     Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout}
 6626:             end,
 6627:             ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6628: 	    exit({timeout, AutoClose, Second})
 6629:     end,
 6630: 
 6631:     ?P("[para] socket info: "
 6632:        "~n   ~p", [SockInfo()]),
 6633:     {error, Error_2} = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6634:     after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_2),
 6635:     ?P("[para] cleanup - await sender terminations"),
 6636:     st_await_sender_termination(Snd1, Snd2),
 6637:     ?P("[para] cleanup - close socket"),
 6638:     send_timeout_close(A),
 6639:     ?P("[para] cleanup - kill sink"),
 6640:     exit(Pid, kill),
 6641:     ?P("[para] done"),
 6642:     ok.
 6643: 
 6644: %% Spawn a closer process, transfer "ownership" of the socket
 6645: %% to it and then send it the socket (to close) at its leisure.
 6646: send_timeout_close(Sock) ->
 6647:     F = fun() ->
 6648:                 receive
 6649:                     {close, S} ->
 6650:                         (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 6651:                         exit(normal)
 6652:                 end
 6653:         end,
 6654:     Pid = spawn_link(F),
 6655:     case gen_tcp:controlling_process(Sock, Pid) of
 6656:         ok ->
 6657:             Pid ! {close, Sock},
 6658:             ok;
 6659:         {error, Reason} ->
 6660:             ?P("failed transfering ownership to closer process: "
 6661:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6662:             exit(Pid, kill),
 6663:             (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock))
 6664:     end.
 6665:     
 6666: st_await_sender_termination(undefined, undefined) ->
 6667:     ok;
 6668: st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, Sender2) ->
 6669:     receive
 6670:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender1) ->
 6671:             ?P("sender 1 (~p) terminated: "
 6672:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6673:             st_await_sender_termination(undefined, Sender2);
 6674:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender2) ->
 6675:             ?P("sender 2 (~p) terminated: "
 6676:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6677:             st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, undefined)
 6678:     end.
 6679:             
 6680: get_max_diff(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 6681:     receive
 6682: 	ok ->
 6683: 	    get_max_diff2(0)
 6684:     after 10000 ->
 6685:             ?P("timeout awaiting first send result (ok) from sender ~p:"
 6686:                "~n   Sender process info: ~p",
 6687:                [Pid, pi(Pid)]),
 6688: 	    exit(timeout)
 6689:     end.
 6690: 
 6691: get_max_diff2(Max) ->
 6692:     T1 = millis(),
 6693:     receive
 6694: 	ok ->
 6695: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6696: 	    if
 6697: 		Diff > Max ->
 6698: 		    ?P("new max send time: ~w", [Diff]),
 6699: 		    get_max_diff2(Diff);
 6700: 		true ->
 6701: 		    get_max_diff2(Max)
 6702: 	    end;
 6703: 	{error, timeout} ->
 6704: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6705: 	    if
 6706: 		Diff > Max ->
 6707: 		    ?P("timeout diff (> prev max send to): ~w", [Diff]),
 6708: 		    Diff;
 6709: 		true ->
 6710: 		    Max
 6711: 	    end
 6712:     after 10000 ->
 6713:               exit(timeout)
 6714:     end.
 6715: 	    
 6716: after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason) ->
 6717:     case Reason of
 6718:         timeout              when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6719:         {timeout, _RestData} when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6720:         enotconn             when AutoClose =:= true  -> ok;
 6721: 	closed               when AutoClose           -> ok;
 6722:         _ ->
 6723:             ?P("after_send_timeout -> "
 6724:                "~n      AutoClose: ~w"
 6725:                "~n      Reason:    ~p", [AutoClose, Reason]),
 6726:             exit({after_send_timeout, AutoClose, Reason})
 6727:     end.
 6728: 
 6729: 
 6730: %% Test the send_timeout socket option for active sockets.
 6731: send_timeout_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6732:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6733:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6734:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6735:                             Addr;
 6736:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6737:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6738:                     end
 6739:            end,
 6740:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) end,
 6741:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6742:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6743: 
 6744: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) ->
 6745:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6746:     {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6747:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, false, RNode),
 6748:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, true, RNode),
 6749:     ?STOP_NODE(RNode),
 6750:     ok.
 6751: 
 6752: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6753:     {A,C} = setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, 1, AutoClose),
 6754:     inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6755:     Mad = spawn_link(RNode, fun() -> mad_sender(C) end),
 6756:     ListData = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
 6757:     F = fun() ->
 6758:                 ?P("[sink action] await data"),
 6759: 		receive
 6760: 		    {tcp, _Sock, _Data} ->
 6761:                         ?P("[sink action] active -> once"),
 6762: 			inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6763:                         ?P("[sink action] send payload"),
 6764: 			Res = gen_tcp:send(A, ListData),
 6765: 			Res;
 6766: 		    Unexpected ->
 6767: 			?P("[sink action] unexpected message: "
 6768:                            "~n      ~p", [Unexpected]),
 6769: 			Unexpected
 6770: 		end
 6771: 	end,
 6772:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(F, 1),
 6773:     unlink(Mad),
 6774:     exit(Mad, kill),
 6775:     flush(),
 6776:     ok.
 6777: 
 6778: mad_sender(S) ->
 6779:     put(action,  nothing),
 6780:     put(sent,    0),
 6781:     put(elapsed, 0),
 6782:     mad_sender(S, 0).
 6783: 
 6784: mad_sender(S, N) ->
 6785:     U = rand:uniform(1000000),
 6786:     put(action, send),
 6787:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6788:     Ret     = gen_tcp:send(S, integer_to_list(U)),
 6789:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6790:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 6791:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 6792:     put(action, sent),
 6793:     N2 = N + 1,
 6794:     put(sent,   N2),
 6795:     case Ret of
 6796:         ok ->
 6797:             mad_sender(S, N + 1);
 6798:         {error, timeout} = ERROR1 ->
 6799:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: timeout"
 6800:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6801:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6802:                [N2, cmillis(get(elapsed))]),
 6803:             ERROR1;
 6804:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} = ERROR2 ->
 6805:             ?P("mad_sender -> "
 6806:                "send failed: timeout with ~w bytes of rest data"
 6807:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6808:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6809:                [rest_data_size(RestData), N2, cmillis(get(elapsed))]),
 6810:             ERROR2;
 6811:         {error, Reason} = ERROR3 ->
 6812:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6813:                "~n   ~p"
 6814:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6815:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6816:                [Reason, N2, cmillis(get(elapsed))]),
 6817:             ERROR3;
 6818:         ERROR4 ->
 6819:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6820:                "~n   ~p"
 6821:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6822:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6823:                [ERROR4, N2, cmillis(get(elapsed))]),
 6824:             ERROR4
 6825:     end.
 6826: 
 6827: flush() ->
 6828:     receive
 6829: 	_X ->
 6830: 	    flush()
 6831:     after 0 ->
 6832: 	    ok
 6833:     end.
 6834: 
 6835: setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr) ->
 6836:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6837:     ?P("[setup] start node"),
 6838:     R = case ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir) of
 6839:             {ok, Node} ->
 6840:                 Node;
 6841:             {error, Reason} ->
 6842:                 ?SKIPT(?F("failed starting node: ~p", [Reason]))
 6843:         end,
 6844:     ?P("[setup] get (\"proper\")local address"),
 6845:     {ok, Addr} = ?LIB:which_local_addr(inet),
 6846: %%%     Host = get_hostname(node()),
 6847:     ?P("[setup] create listen socket (with ~p)", [Addr]),
 6848:     L = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{packet,2}]) of
 6849:             {ok, LSock} ->
 6850:                 LSock;
 6851:             {error, eaddrnotavail = LReason} ->
 6852:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6853:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 6854:         end,
 6855:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6856:     ?P("[setup] listen socket port: "
 6857:        "~n   Port: ~p", [Port]),
 6858:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 6859:                   receive
 6860:                       {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6861:                           From ! {self(),X()}, F(F);
 6862:                       die -> ok
 6863:                   end
 6864:           end,
 6865:     ?P("[setup] create remote runner"),
 6866:     Pid = rpc:call(R,erlang,spawn,[fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 6867:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6868:                      Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6869:                      receive {Pid,X} -> X end
 6870:              end,
 6871:     Connect = fun() -> 
 6872:                       ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6873:                                [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {packet, 2}]) 
 6874:               end,
 6875:     ?P("[setup] create (remote) connection"),
 6876:     C = case Remote(Connect) of
 6877:             {ok, CSock} ->
 6878:                 CSock;
 6879:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 6880:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6881:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 6882:         end,
 6883:     ?P("[setup] accept (local) connection"),
 6884:     A = case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 6885:             {ok, ASock} ->
 6886:                 ASock;
 6887:             {error, eaddrnotavail = AReason} ->
 6888:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6889:                 ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(AReason))
 6890:         end,
 6891:     ?P("[setup] send (local) and receive (remote) message"),
 6892:     gen_tcp:send(A,"Hello"),
 6893:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6894:     ?P("[setup] close (remote) connection"),
 6895:     ok =  Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:close(C) end),
 6896:     Loop2 = fun(_,_,_,0) ->
 6897: 		    {failure, timeout}; 
 6898: 	       (L2,{MA,MB},F2,N) ->
 6899: 		    case F2() of
 6900: 			MA -> ?P("[setup] action result (MA): ~p", [MA] ), MA;
 6901: 			MB -> ?P("[setup] action result (MB): ~p", [MB] ), MB;
 6902: 			Other -> ?P("[setup] Loop2: ~p",[Other]),
 6903: 				 receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 6904: 				 L2(L2,{MA,MB},F2,N-1)
 6905: 		    end
 6906: 	    end,
 6907:     Loop = fun(Match2,F3) ->  Loop2(Loop2,Match2,F3,10) end,
 6908:     ?P("[setup] stop node"),
 6909:     ?STOP_NODE(R),
 6910:     ?P("[setup] done"),
 6911:     {Loop,A}.
 6912:     
 6913: setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose, BufSz) ->
 6914:     ?P("[sink setup] create listen socket"),
 6915:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ifaddr,             Addr},
 6916:                                   {active,             false},
 6917: 				  {packet,             4},
 6918: 				  {sndbuf,             BufSz},
 6919: 				  {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6920: 				  {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}]),
 6921: 
 6922:     ?P("listen socket created with: "
 6923:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p",
 6924:        [oki(inet:getopts(L, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6925:     Fun = fun(N, F) ->
 6926: 		  receive
 6927: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6928: 			  From ! {self(),X()}, F(N+1,F);
 6929:                       {From, iterations} ->
 6930:                           From ! {self(), N}, F(N, F);
 6931: 		      die ->
 6932:                           ok
 6933: 		  end
 6934: 	  end,
 6935:     ?P("[sink setup] start remote runner process (on ~p)", [RNode]),
 6936:     Pid =  rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(0,Fun) end]),
 6937:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6938:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6939: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6940: 		     receive
 6941:                          {Pid,X} -> X
 6942: 		     end
 6943: 	     end,
 6944:     ?P("[sink setup] connect from remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6945:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 6946: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6947: 				      [{ifaddr, Addr},
 6948:                                        {active, false},
 6949: 				       {packet, 4},
 6950: 				       {recbuf, BufSz div 2},
 6951: 				       {sndbuf, BufSz div 2}])
 6952: 		     end),
 6953:     ?P("[sink setup] accept"),
 6954:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6955:     ?P("[sink setup] accepted with options: "
 6956:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p"
 6957:        "~n   => send 'test' message",
 6958:        [oki(inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6959:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 6960:     ?P("[sink setup] 'test' message sent - "
 6961:        "recv 'test' message on remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6962:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6963:     ?P("[sink setup] cleanup - close listen socket"),
 6964:     (catch gen_tcp:close(L)),
 6965: 
 6966:     ?P("[sink setup] done when: "
 6967:        "~n   Accepted socket: ~p"
 6968:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6969:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6970:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p"
 6971:        "~n   Connected socket: ~p"
 6972:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6973:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6974:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p",
 6975:        [A,
 6976:         oki(inet:getopts(A, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf])),
 6977:         oki(inet:sockname(A)),
 6978:         oki(inet:peername(A)),
 6979:         C,
 6980:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:getopts(C, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf]) end)),
 6981:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:sockname(C) end)),
 6982:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:peername(C) end))]),
 6983: 
 6984:     ?P("[sink setup] done"),
 6985: 
 6986:     {A, Pid}.
 6987: 
 6988: oki({ok, V}) -> V;
 6989: oki(E)       -> E.
 6990: 
 6991: setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose) ->
 6992:     ListenOpts =  [binary,
 6993:                    {ifaddr,             Addr},
 6994: 		   {active,             false},
 6995: 		   {packet,             0},
 6996: 		   {nodelay,            true},
 6997: 		   {keepalive,          true},
 6998: 		   {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6999: 		   {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}],
 7000:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 7001:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 7002: 		  receive
 7003: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 7004: 			  From ! {self(),X()},
 7005: 			  F(F);
 7006: 		      die -> ok
 7007: 		  end
 7008: 	  end,
 7009:     Pid = rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 7010:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 7011:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 7012: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 7013: 		     receive {Pid,X} -> X
 7014: 		     end
 7015: 	     end,
 7016:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 7017: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip,     Addr},
 7018: 			                                   {active, false}])
 7019: 		     end),
 7020:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 7021:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 7022:     {ok, "H"++_} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C, 0) end),
 7023:     {A, C}.
 7024: 
 7025: %% timeout_sink_loop(Action) ->
 7026: %%     timeout_sink_loop(Action, 1).
 7027: 
 7028: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To) ->
 7029:     put(action,   nothing),
 7030:     put(sent,     0),
 7031:     put(elapsed,  0),
 7032:     put(send_max, 0),
 7033:     put(lsendts,  "-"), % Last Send TS (time stamp)
 7034:     timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, 0).
 7035: 
 7036: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N) ->
 7037:     put(action, send),
 7038:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 7039:     Ret     = Action(),
 7040:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 7041:     LSendTS = ?FTS(),
 7042:     SendT   = Stop - Start,
 7043:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 7044:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + SendT),
 7045:     SendMax = get(send_max),
 7046:     if (SendT > SendMax) -> put(send_max, SendT);
 7047:        true              -> ok
 7048:     end,
 7049:     put(action, sent),
 7050:     put(lsendts, LSendTS),
 7051:     N2 = N + 1,
 7052:     put(sent,   N2),
 7053:     case Ret of
 7054: 	ok ->
 7055: 	    receive
 7056:                 {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout} ->
 7057:                     ?P("[sink-loop] info and die: "
 7058:                        "~n   Socket Info:  ~p"
 7059:                        "~n   Send Timeout: ~p",
 7060:                        [SockInfo(), SockTimeout()]),
 7061:                     exit(normal)
 7062:             after To -> ok end,
 7063: 	    timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N+1);
 7064: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7065:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 7066:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 7067:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 7068:                "~n   Result:            timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 7069:                [N2, cmillis(get(elapsed)), rest_data_size(RestData)]),
 7070: 	    {{error, timeout}, N2};
 7071: 	Other ->
 7072:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 7073:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 7074:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 7075:                "~n   Result:            ~p",
 7076:                [N2, cmillis(get(elapsed)), Other]),
 7077: 	    {Other, N2}
 7078:     end.
 7079: 
 7080: 
 7081: rest_data_size(Bin) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 7082:     byte_size(Bin);
 7083: rest_data_size([]) ->
 7084:     0;
 7085: rest_data_size([Bin|IOVec]) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 7086:     byte_size(Bin) + rest_data_size(IOVec).
 7087: 
 7088: 
 7089: %% =========================================================================
 7090: 
 7091: send_timeout_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7092:     ct:timetrap(?SECS(16)),
 7093:     Cond = fun() ->
 7094:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7095:                        true ->
 7096:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 7097:                        false ->
 7098:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 7099:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 7100:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 7101:                                    {skip,
 7102:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 7103:                                _ ->
 7104:                                    ok
 7105:                            end
 7106:                    end
 7107:            end,
 7108:     Pre  = fun() ->
 7109:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 7110:                    ?P("create node"),
 7111:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 7112:                    RNode
 7113:            end,
 7114:     Case = fun(Node) -> do_send_timeout_resume(Config, Node, 13) end,
 7115:     Post = fun(Node) ->
 7116:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 7117:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 7118:            end,
 7119:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 7120: 
 7121: do_send_timeout_resume(Config, RNode, BlockPow) ->
 7122:     BlockSize = 1 bsl BlockPow,
 7123:     1         = rand:uniform(1),
 7124:     Seed      = rand:export_seed(),
 7125:     ListenOpts =
 7126:         [inet,
 7127:          binary,
 7128:          {backlog, 2},
 7129:          {active,  false}],
 7130:     ConnectOpts =
 7131:         [inet,
 7132:          {send_timeout, 0},
 7133:          {active,       false},
 7134:          binary],
 7135:     StreamOpts =
 7136:         [{high_watermark, BlockSize},
 7137:          {low_watermark,  BlockSize bsr 1},
 7138:          {sndbuf,         BlockSize},
 7139:          {recbuf,         BlockSize},
 7140:          {buffer,         BlockSize bsl 1}],
 7141:     Client = self(),
 7142:     Tag = make_ref(),
 7143:     {Server, Mref} =
 7144:         spawn_opt(
 7145:           RNode,
 7146:           fun () ->
 7147:                   send_timeout_resume_srv(
 7148:                     Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts)
 7149:           end, [monitor, link]),
 7150:     ?P("Client=~p Server=~p Tag=~p~n", [Client, Server, Tag]),
 7151:     receive
 7152:         {Tag, port, Port} ->
 7153:             ok;
 7154:         {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Port} ->
 7155:             %% Use variable Port just to get export from case
 7156:             ct:fail(Port)
 7157:     end,
 7158:     ?P("connecting to ~p~n", [Port]),
 7159:     {ok, C} = ?CONNECT(Config, localhost, Port, ConnectOpts, 2000),
 7160:     try
 7161:         ok = inet:setopts(C, StreamOpts),
 7162:         ?P("client StreamOpts: ~p~n",
 7163:            [inet:getopts(C, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7164:         receive
 7165:             {Tag, send} ->
 7166:                 ok;
 7167:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Error2} ->
 7168:                 ct:fail(Error2)
 7169:         end,
 7170:         RetryTimeout = str_which_retry_timeout(),
 7171:         ?P("send"),
 7172:         {N, Timeouts} =
 7173:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(C, Server, Tag,
 7174:                                         RetryTimeout, BlockSize),
 7175:         ?P("await server (~p) reply (DOWN)", [Server]),
 7176:         receive
 7177:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Result} ->
 7178:                 ?P("received DOWN message from server:"
 7179:                    "~n   N:        ~p"
 7180:                    "~n   Timeouts: ~p"
 7181:                    "~n   Result:   ~p", [N, Timeouts, Result]),
 7182:                 case Result of
 7183:                     {Tag, ok, Count}
 7184:                       when Count =:= N * BlockSize,
 7185:                            %% We should get 10 time-outs.
 7186:                            %% If we do not get more than one, it seems
 7187:                            %% we get stuck when trying to poll the
 7188:                            %% send buffer with send_timeout = 0,
 7189:                            %% so that did not work
 7190:                            1 < Timeouts ->
 7191:                         ?P("count checked out"),
 7192:                         ok;
 7193:                     {Tag, ok, Count} when Count =:= N * BlockSize ->
 7194:                         ?P("Unexpected number of timeouts: ~w", [Timeouts]),
 7195:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7196:                     {Tag, ok, Count} ->
 7197:                         ?P("Unexpected counts: "
 7198:                            "~n      Got:      ~p"
 7199:                            "~n      Expected: ~p", [Count, N*BlockSize]),
 7200:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7201:                     {Tag, Res, _Count} ->
 7202:                         ?P("Unexpected res: "
 7203:                            "~n      Res: ~p", [Res]),
 7204:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7205:                     _ ->
 7206:                         ct:fail(Result)
 7207:                 end
 7208:         end
 7209:     after
 7210:         ?P("after: kill (failsafe) server"),
 7211:         exit(Server, failsafe),
 7212:         ?P("after: close socket"),
 7213:         gen_tcp:close(C),
 7214:         ?P("after: done"),
 7215:         ok
 7216:     end.
 7217: 
 7218: optnames(Opts) ->
 7219:     [Name || {Name, _} <- Opts].
 7220: 
 7221: str_which_retry_timeout() ->
 7222:     case os:type() of
 7223:         {unix, darwin} ->
 7224:             %% This is really sketchy, but it seems to "work"...
 7225:             %% Don't know if its the processor (M1) or if its the
 7226:             %% OS/darwin version (darwin 21.x).
 7227:             %% But since we don't have any intel macs running 21...
 7228:             case os:version() of
 7229:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 20) ->
 7230:                     25;
 7231:                 _ ->
 7232:                     100
 7233:             end;
 7234:         {unix, freebsd} ->
 7235:             %% Has seen this on FreeBSD 12.2 and later.
 7236:             case os:version() of
 7237:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 13) ->
 7238:                     25;
 7239:                 {Major, Minor, _} when (Major =:= 12) andalso
 7240:                                        (Minor >= 2) ->
 7241:                     25;
 7242:                 _ ->
 7243:                     100
 7244:             end;
 7245:         _ ->
 7246:             100
 7247:     end.
 7248:     
 7249: %% Fill buffers
 7250: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7251:     ?P("try send-timeout-resume with"
 7252:        "~n   RetryTimeout: ~w ms"
 7253:        "~n   BlockSize:    ~w", [RetryTimeout, BlockSize]),
 7254:     do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, 0, RetryTimeout, BlockSize).
 7255: 
 7256: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, N, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7257:     Bin = random_data(BlockSize),
 7258:     case send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, 0) of
 7259:         0 ->
 7260:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag,
 7261:                                         N + 1, RetryTimeout, BlockSize);
 7262:         Timeouts ->
 7263:             ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7264:             {N + 1, Timeouts}
 7265:     end.
 7266: 
 7267: send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, Timeouts) ->
 7268:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Bin) of
 7269:         ok ->
 7270:             ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> success => done when"
 7271:                "~n      N:           ~p"
 7272:                "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7273:                "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7274:             Timeouts;
 7275:         {error, Reason} ->
 7276:             case Reason of
 7277:                 timeout ->
 7278:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout:"
 7279:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7280:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7281:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7282:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7283:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7284:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7285:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7286:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7287:                       S, Server, Tag, N, <<>>, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7288:                 {timeout, RestData} ->
 7289:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout with RestData: "
 7290:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7291:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7292:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7293:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7294:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7295:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7296:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7297:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7298:                       S, Server, Tag, N, RestData, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7299:                 _ ->
 7300:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> unexpected send failure: "
 7301:                        "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 7302:                        "~n   when"
 7303:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7304:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7305:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7306:                        [Reason, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7307:                     error({Reason, N, Timeouts})
 7308:             end
 7309:     end.
 7310: 
 7311: random_data(0) ->
 7312:     <<>>;
 7313: random_data(Size) ->
 7314:     <<(rand:uniform(256) - 1), (random_data(Size - 1))/binary>>.
 7315: 
 7316: compare_data(<<>>, Count) ->
 7317:     Count;
 7318: compare_data(<<Byte, Bin/binary>>, Count) ->
 7319:     case rand:uniform(256) - 1 of
 7320:         Byte ->
 7321:             compare_data(Bin, Count + 1);
 7322:         _ ->
 7323:             error({diff, Count})
 7324:     end.
 7325: 
 7326: send_timeout_resume_srv(Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts) ->
 7327:     rand:seed(Seed),
 7328:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 7329:     ?P("[server] get listen StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7330:        [inet:getopts(L, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7331:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 7332:     Client ! {Tag, port, P},
 7333:     %%
 7334:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L, 2000),
 7335:     ?P("[server] accept success ~p", [A]),
 7336:     ok = inet:setopts(A, StreamOpts),
 7337:     ?P("[server] get accept StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7338:        [inet:getopts(A, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7339:     Client ! {Tag, send},
 7340:     %%
 7341:     receive
 7342:         {Tag, rec} ->
 7343:             ?P("[server] received recv command - now wait some time"),
 7344:             receive after 5000 -> ok end,
 7345:             ?P("[server] begin receiving (on ~p)", [A]),
 7346:             exit({Tag, ok, send_timeout_resume_srv(A, 0)})
 7347:     end.
 7348: 
 7349: send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count) ->
 7350:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0) of
 7351:         {ok, Data} ->
 7352:             Count_1 = compare_data(Data, Count),
 7353:             send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count_1);
 7354:         {error, closed} ->
 7355:             Count;
 7356:         {error, Reason} ->
 7357:             error({Reason, Count})
 7358:     end.
 7359: 
 7360: 
 7361: 
 7362: has_superfluous_schedulers() ->
 7363:     case {erlang:system_info(schedulers),
 7364: 	  erlang:system_info(logical_processors)} of
 7365: 	{S, unknown} when S > 1 -> true;
 7366: 	{S, P} when S > P -> true;
 7367: 	_ -> false
 7368:     end.
 7369: 
 7370: 
 7371: %% Leaking message from inet_drv {inet_reply,P,ok}
 7372: %% when a socket sending resumes working after a send_timeout.
 7373: %% Should we even bother testing this if 'inet_backend = socket'?
 7374: otp_7731(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7375:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7376:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7377:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7378:                             Addr;
 7379:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7380:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7381:                     end
 7382:            end,
 7383:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) end,
 7384:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7385:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7386: 
 7387: do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) ->
 7388:     ?P("[ctrl] create server"),
 7389:     ME = self(),
 7390:     ServerPid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, ME) end),
 7391:     ?P("[ctrl] await listening port (number) from server"),
 7392:     receive {ServerPid, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7393: 
 7394:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server on port ~w", [PortNum]),
 7395:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7396:                             [binary,
 7397:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7398:                              {active,       false},
 7399:                              {packet,       raw},
 7400:                              {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7401: 
 7402:     ?P("[ctrl] send data"),
 7403:     otp_7731_send(Socket),
 7404:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - order server to recv"),
 7405:     ServerPid ! {self(), recv},
 7406:     ?P("[ctrl] await 'recv complete' from server"),
 7407:     receive {ServerPid, ok} -> ?P("[ctrl] received 'recv complete'"), ok end,
 7408: 
 7409:     %% Now make sure inet_drv does not leak any internal messages.
 7410:     ?P("[ctrl] waiting for leaking messages..."),
 7411:     receive Msg ->
 7412:             ?P("[ctrl] got unexpected message: "
 7413:                "~n      ~p", [Msg]),
 7414: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Msg})
 7415:     after 1000 ->
 7416: 	    ok
 7417:     end,
 7418:     ?P("[ctrl] no leaking messages - cleanup"),
 7419:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Socket)),
 7420:     ServerPid ! {self(), die},
 7421:     ?P("[ctrl] done."),
 7422:     ok.
 7423:     
 7424: otp_7731_send(Socket) ->
 7425:     Bin = <<1:10000>>,
 7426:     ?P("[client] sending ~p bytes...", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 7427:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin) of
 7428:         ok ->
 7429:             otp_7731_send(Socket);
 7430:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7431:             ?P("[client] send timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 7432:                [byte_size(RestData)]),
 7433:             ok;
 7434:         {error, timeout} ->
 7435:             ?P("[client] send timeout"),
 7436:             ok
 7437:     end.
 7438: 
 7439: otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7440:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 7441:     {ok, LSocket} =
 7442:         ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw}, {active, false}]),
 7443:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7444:     ?P("[server] listening on port number ~p", [PortNum]),
 7445:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7446: 
 7447:     ?P("[server] accept"),
 7448:     {ok, CSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7449:     ?P("[server] accepted - close listen socket"),
 7450:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7451: 
 7452:     ?P("[server] await recv order"),
 7453:     receive {Ctrl, recv} -> ok end,
 7454:     
 7455:     ?P("[server] start receiving..."),
 7456:     otp_7731_recv(CSocket),
 7457: 
 7458:     ?P("[server] announce recv done"),
 7459:     Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7460: 
 7461:     ?P("[server] finished, (connection) closing..."),
 7462:     gen_tcp:close(CSocket),
 7463:     receive {Ctrl, die} -> ok end,
 7464:     ?P("[server] done"),
 7465:     exit(normal).
 7466: 
 7467: 
 7468: otp_7731_recv(Socket) ->
 7469:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7470:         {ok, Bin} ->
 7471:             ?P("[server] received ~p bytes", [size(Bin)]),
 7472:             otp_7731_recv(Socket);
 7473:         {error, timeout} ->
 7474:             ?P("[server] receive timeout - done recv"),
 7475:             ok
 7476:     end.
 7477: 
 7478: 
 7479: %% OTP-7615: TCP-ports hanging in CLOSING state when sending large
 7480: %% buffer followed by a recv() that returns error due to closed
 7481: %% connection.
 7482: %% OTP-7615 Leaking closed ports.
 7483: %% This is a specific inet-driver bug, skip this when using 'socket'
 7484: zombie_sockets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7485:     Cond = fun() ->
 7486:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7487:                        true ->
 7488:                            {skip, "Inet driver specific test"};
 7489:                        false ->
 7490:                            ok
 7491:                    end
 7492:            end,
 7493:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7494:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7495:                             Addr;
 7496:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7497:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7498:                     end
 7499:            end,
 7500:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) end,
 7501:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7502:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7503: 
 7504: do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) ->
 7505:     register(zombie_collector,self()),
 7506:     Calls = 10,
 7507:     ?P("create zombie server"),
 7508:     Server = spawn_link(?MODULE, zombie_server, [Config, Addr, self(), Calls]),
 7509:     {Server, ready, PortNum} = receive Msg -> Msg  end,
 7510:     ?P("Ports before = ~p",[lists:sort(erlang:ports())]),
 7511:     zombie_client_loop(Config, Calls, Addr, PortNum),
 7512:     Ports = lists:sort(zombie_collector(Calls, [])),
 7513:     Server ! terminate,
 7514:     ?P("Collected ports = ~p", [Ports]),
 7515:     [] = zombies_alive(Ports, 10),
 7516:     timer:sleep(1000),
 7517:     ?P("done"),
 7518:     ok.
 7519: 
 7520: zombie_client_loop(_Config, 0, _, _) ->
 7521:     ?P("[zombie client] done"),
 7522:     ok;
 7523: zombie_client_loop(Config, N, Addr, PortNum) when is_integer(PortNum) ->
 7524:     ?P("[zombie client][~w] try connect", [N]),
 7525:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7526:                             [binary,
 7527:                              {ip,     Addr},
 7528:                              {active, false},
 7529:                              {packet, raw}]),
 7530:     ?P("[zombie client] connected - now close ~p", [Socket]),
 7531:     gen_tcp:close(Socket), % to make server recv fail
 7532:     zombie_client_loop(Config, N-1, Addr, PortNum).
 7533: 
 7534: 
 7535: zombie_collector(0, Acc) ->
 7536:     ?P("[zombie collector] done: "
 7537:        "~n   ~p", [Acc]),
 7538:     Acc;
 7539: zombie_collector(N, Acc) ->
 7540:     receive 
 7541: 	{closed, Socket} -> 
 7542:             ?P("[zombie collector] ~p closed", [Socket]),
 7543: 	    zombie_collector(N-1, [Socket|Acc]);
 7544: 	E -> 
 7545: 	    {unexpected, E, Acc}
 7546:     end.
 7547: 	    
 7548: zombies_alive(Ports, WaitSec) ->
 7549:     Alive = lists:sort(erlang:ports()),
 7550:     ?P("[zombies alive][~w] Alive: ~p", [WaitSec, Alive]),
 7551:     Zombies = lists:filter(fun(P) -> lists:member(P, Alive) end, Ports),
 7552:     case Zombies of
 7553: 	[] -> [];
 7554: 	_ ->
 7555: 	    case WaitSec of
 7556: 		0 -> Zombies;
 7557: 		_ -> timer:sleep(1000), % Wait some more for zombies to die
 7558: 		     zombies_alive(Zombies, WaitSec-1)
 7559: 	    end
 7560:     end.
 7561: 
 7562: zombie_server(Config, Addr, Pid, Calls) ->
 7563:     ?P("[zombie server] try create listen socket with backlog: ~w", [Calls]),
 7564:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw},
 7565:                                       {active, false}, {backlog, Calls}]),
 7566:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 7567:     ?P("[zombie server] Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSock, PortNum]),
 7568:     BigBin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(100*1024, 77)),
 7569:     ?P("[zombie server] send ready"),
 7570:     Pid ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7571:     zombie_accept_loop(LSock, BigBin, Calls),
 7572:     ?P("[zombie server] await terminate"),
 7573:     terminate = receive Msg -> Msg end,
 7574:     ?P("[zombie server] terminating"),
 7575:     ok.
 7576: 
 7577: zombie_accept_loop(_, _, 0) ->
 7578:     ?P("[zombie server] accept loop done"),
 7579:     ok;
 7580: zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls) ->
 7581:     ?P("[zombie server][~w] try accept", [Calls]),
 7582:     case gen_tcp:accept(Socket) of
 7583: 	{ok, NewSocket} ->
 7584:             ?P("[zombie server][~w] accepted ~p - create handler",
 7585:                [Calls, NewSocket]),
 7586: 	    spawn_link(fun() -> zombie_server_handler(NewSocket, BigBin) end),
 7587: 	    zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls-1);
 7588: 	E ->
 7589: 	    E
 7590:     end.
 7591: 
 7592: zombie_server_handler(Socket, Bin) ->
 7593:     ?P("[zombie server handler] got connection on ~p - attempt send", [Socket]),
 7594:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin),
 7595:     ?P("[zombie server handler] Sent data, waiting for reply on ~p", [Socket]),
 7596:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 4) of
 7597:         {error, closed} ->
 7598:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: closed (expected)"),
 7599:             ok;
 7600:         {error, econnaborted} -> % may be returned on Windows
 7601:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: econnaborted (expected)"),
 7602:             ok;
 7603:         {error, Reason} ->
 7604:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv failure reason: ~p",
 7605:                [Reason]),
 7606:             exit({unexpected_recv_error_reason, Reason});
 7607:         {ok, _} ->
 7608:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv success"),
 7609:             exit(unexpected_recv_success)
 7610: 	  end,
 7611:     ?P("[zombie server handler] close socket ~p", [Socket]),
 7612:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7613:     ?P("[zombie server handler] socket closed: inform collector"),
 7614:     zombie_collector ! {closed, Socket}.
 7615: 
 7616: 
 7617: %% Hanging send on windows when sending iolist with more than 16 binaries.
 7618: otp_7816(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7619:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(2)),
 7620:     Cond = fun() ->
 7621: 		   %% With 'socket on Windows' we have actually no way to
 7622: 		   %% actually *know* that nothing is sent even after a timeout
 7623: 		   %% (and the send cancel that socket issues). The I/O 
 7624: 		   %% Completion Port framework may well have buffers still
 7625: 		   %% handle the data and send it as soon as it can.
 7626: 		   %% Basically, data is "out of our hands" as soon as we
 7627: 		   %% give it to the framework. Cancel may have "no effect"
 7628: 		   %% even if the completion operation is reported as
 7629: 		   %% 'aborted'.
 7630: 		   %% So, this test case simply does not work.
 7631: 		   case os:type() of
 7632: 		        {win32, nt} ->
 7633: 			   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7634: 			       true ->
 7635: 				   {skip,
 7636: 				    "Not compatible with 'socket on Windows'"};
 7637: 			       false ->
 7638: 				   ok
 7639: 				       end;
 7640: 		       _ ->
 7641: 			   ok
 7642: 		   end
 7643: 	   end,
 7644:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7645:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7646:                             Addr;
 7647:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7648:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7649:                     end
 7650:            end,
 7651:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) end,
 7652:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7653:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7654: 
 7655: do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) ->
 7656:     Ctrl = self(),
 7657:     ?P("[ctrl] create server process..."),
 7658:     Server = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) end),
 7659:     ?P("[ctrl] await server process ready..."),
 7660:     receive {Server, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7661: 
 7662:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server..."),
 7663:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7664:                             [binary,
 7665:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7666:                              {active,       false},
 7667:                              {packet,       4},
 7668:                              {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7669: 
 7670:     %% We use the undocumented feature that sending can be resumed after
 7671:     %% a send_timeout without any data loss if the peer starts to receive data.
 7672:     %% Unless of course the 7816-bug is in affect, in which case the write event
 7673:     %% for the socket is lost on windows and not all data is sent.
 7674: 
 7675:     ?P("[ctrl] begin sending..."),
 7676: 
 7677:     [otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, 18, BinSize, Server) ||
 7678: 	BinSize <- lists:seq(1000, 2000, 123)],
 7679: 
 7680:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - close socket"),
 7681: 
 7682:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7683:     ?P("[ctrl] stop server"),
 7684:     Server ! {self(), closed},
 7685:     ?P("[ctrl] await server stopped"),
 7686:     {Server, closed} = receive M -> M end,
 7687:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 7688:     ok.
 7689: 
 7690: 
 7691: otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, BinNr, BinSize, Server) ->
 7692:     ?P("[ctrl] create payload (BinSz: ~w)...", [BinSize]),
 7693:     Data = lists:duplicate(BinNr, <<1:(BinSize*8)>>),
 7694:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info prior to start sending: "
 7695:        "~n      ~p", [inet:info(Socket)]),
 7696:     Ctrl   = self(),
 7697:     Client = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) end),
 7698:     SentBytes =
 7699: 	receive
 7700: 	    {Client, continue, Loops} ->
 7701: 		?P("[ctrl] received continue from client: ~p", [Loops]),
 7702: 		SB = Loops * BinNr * BinSize,
 7703: 		Server ! {self(), recv, SB},
 7704: 		SB
 7705: 	end,
 7706:     ct:sleep(1000),
 7707:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info after sending ~w bytes: "
 7708:        "~n      ~p", [SentBytes, inet:info(Socket)]),
 7709:     ?P("[ctrl] await server result..."),
 7710:     ok = receive
 7711: 	     {Server, SR} ->
 7712: 		 ?P("[ctrl] server result: ~p", [SR]),
 7713: 		 SR
 7714: 	 end,
 7715:     ?P("[ctrl] await client termination..."),
 7716:     ok = receive
 7717: 	     {'EXIT', Client, normal} ->
 7718: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client normal exit"),
 7719: 		 ok;
 7720: 	     {'EXIT', Client, CR} ->
 7721: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client unexpected exit reason: ~p", [CR]),
 7722: 		 CR
 7723: 	 end,
 7724:     ?P("[ctrl] done with BinSz: ~p", [BinSize]),
 7725:     ok.
 7726:     
 7727: 
 7728: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) ->
 7729:     otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, 0).
 7730: 
 7731: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops) ->
 7732:     ?P("[client] sending data (~w bytes, ~w)...", [iolist_size(Data), Loops]),
 7733:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 7734: 	ok ->
 7735: 	    otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops+1);
 7736: 
 7737: 	{error, timeout} when is_port(Socket) ->
 7738: 	    %% For the 'classic' sockets, when the OS buffers are
 7739: 	    %% full, the rest data are put into the (inet driver)
 7740: 	    %% internal, for later sending. SO, it can be counted
 7741: 	    %% as sent.
 7742: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p (+1)", [Loops]),
 7743: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7744: 	    exit(normal);
 7745: 
 7746: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7747: 	    %% For inet_backend = 'socket' when we nothing of the
 7748: 	    %% message was sent.
 7749: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p", [Loops]),
 7750: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops},
 7751: 	    exit(normal);
 7752: 
 7753: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7754: 	    %% A timeout means that **some** of the data was not sent,
 7755: 	    %% currently there is no way to know how much.
 7756: 	    %% NOTE THAT THIS MEANS THAT WE MAY HAVE A PARTIAL PACKAGE
 7757: 	    %% WRITTEN, INCLUDING A HEADER THAT INDICATES A DATA
 7758: 	    %% SIZE THAT IS **NOT** PRESENT!!
 7759: 	    %% So for this test case to work, we need to write the rest.
 7760: 	    %% But we cannot do that without first setting the package to raw.
 7761: 	    %%
 7762: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout"
 7763: 	       "~n      with ~w bytes of rest data"
 7764: 	       "~n      when Loops: ~p", [rest_data_size(RestData), Loops]),
 7765: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7766: 	    ?P("[client] packet to 'raw'..."),
 7767: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, raw}, {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7768: 	    ?P("[client] send ~w bytes of rest data...",
 7769: 	       [rest_data_size(RestData)]),
 7770: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, RestData),
 7771: 	    ?P("[client] packet (back) to '4'..."),
 7772: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, 4}, {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7773: 	    ?P("[client] done"),
 7774: 	    exit(normal)
 7775: 
 7776:     end.
 7777:     
 7778:     
 7779: otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7780:     ?P("[server] create listening socket"),
 7781:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,  {ip, Addr},
 7782:                                         {packet, 4},
 7783:                                         {active, false}]),
 7784:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7785:     ?P("[server] listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7786:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7787: 
 7788:     ?P("[server] accept connection..."),
 7789:     {ok, ASocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7790:     ?P("[server] connection accepted..."),
 7791:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7792: 
 7793:     otp_7816_server_loop(ASocket, Ctrl),
 7794: 
 7795:     ?P("[server] terminating").
 7796: 
 7797: 
 7798: otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl) ->
 7799:     ?P("[server] waiting for order..."),
 7800:     receive 
 7801: 	{Ctrl, recv, RecvBytes} -> 
 7802: 	    ?P("[server] start receiving (~w bytes)...", [RecvBytes]),
 7803: 
 7804: 	    ok = otp_7816_recv(Socket, RecvBytes),
 7805: 	    
 7806: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7807: 	    otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl);
 7808: 	
 7809: 	{Ctrl, closed} ->
 7810: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000),
 7811: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), closed}
 7812:     end.
 7813: 
 7814: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft) ->
 7815:     otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, 1).
 7816: 
 7817: otp_7816_recv(_, 0, _) ->
 7818:     ?P("[server] got all data"),
 7819:     ok;
 7820: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, N) ->
 7821:     ?P("[server,~w] try recv (~p bytes left)", [N, BytesLeft]),
 7822:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7823: 	{ok, Bin} when (byte_size(Bin) =< BytesLeft) andalso
 7824: 		       (byte_size(Bin) > 0) -> 
 7825: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received ~p of ~p bytes",
 7826: 	       [N, size(Bin), BytesLeft]),
 7827: 	    otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft - byte_size(Bin), N+1);
 7828: 	{ok, Bin} ->
 7829: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received unexpected data: "
 7830: 	       "~n   Expected:    ~p bytes"
 7831: 	       "~n   Received:    ~p bytes"
 7832: 	       "~n   Socket Info: ~p",
 7833: 	       [N, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin), inet:info(Socket)]),
 7834: 	    {error, {unexpected_data, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin)}};
 7835: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7836: 	    ?P("[server,~w] got receive timeout when expecting more data:"
 7837: 	       "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N,inet:info(Socket)]),
 7838: 	    {error, timeout}
 7839:     end.
 7840: 
 7841: 
 7842: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 7843: 
 7844: %% Receive a packet with a faulty packet header.
 7845: otp_8102(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7846:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7847:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7848:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7849:                             Addr;
 7850:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7851:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7852:                     end
 7853:            end,
 7854:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) end,
 7855:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7856:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7857: 
 7858: do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) ->
 7859:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 7860:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7861:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7862: 
 7863:     [otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, otp_8102_packet(Type, Size))
 7864:      || Size <- lists:seq(-10,-1), 
 7865: 	Type <- [4, {cdr,big}, {cdr,little}]],
 7866:     
 7867:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7868:     ok.
 7869: 
 7870: otp_8102_packet(4, Size) ->
 7871:     {<<Size:32/big>>, 4};
 7872: otp_8102_packet({cdr,big}, Size) ->
 7873:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,0,0,Size:32/big>>, cdr};
 7874: otp_8102_packet({cdr,little}, Size) ->
 7875:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,1,0,Size:32/little>>, cdr}.
 7876: 
 7877: otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, {Bin,PType}) ->
 7878: 
 7879:     ?P("Connect with packet option ~p ...",[PType]),
 7880:     {ok, RSocket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum, [binary,
 7881:                                                      {ip,     Addr},
 7882:                                                      {packet, PType},
 7883:                                                      {active, true}]),
 7884:     {ok, SSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7885: 
 7886:     ?P("Got connection, sending ~p...",[Bin]),
 7887: 
 7888:     ok = gen_tcp:send(SSocket, Bin),
 7889: 
 7890:     ?P("Sending complete...",[]),
 7891: 
 7892:     {tcp_error,RSocket,emsgsize} = receive M -> M end,
 7893: 
 7894:     ?P("Got error msg, ok."),
 7895:     gen_tcp:close(SSocket),    
 7896:     gen_tcp:close(RSocket).
 7897: 
 7898: %% Verify packet_size handles long HTTP header lines.
 7899: otp_9389(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7900:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7901:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7902:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7903:                             Addr;
 7904:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7905:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7906:                     end
 7907:            end,
 7908:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) end,
 7909:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7910:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7911: 
 7912: do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) ->
 7913:     {ok, LS} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 7914:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 7915:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LS, PortNum]),
 7916:     OrigLinkHdr = "/" ++ string:chars($S, 8192),
 7917:     _Server = spawn_link(
 7918:                 fun() ->
 7919:                         {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 7920:                         ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet_size, 16384}]),
 7921:                         ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr),
 7922:                         ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 7923:                 end),
 7924:     {ok, S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7925:                        [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 7926:     Req = "GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n"
 7927:         ++ "Host: " ++ inet_parse:ntoa(Addr) ++ "\r\n"
 7928:         ++ "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7929:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Req),
 7930:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, http}]),
 7931:     {ok, {http_response, {1,1}, 200, "OK"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7932:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, httph}, {packet_size, 16384}]),
 7933:     {ok, {http_header, _, 'Content-Length', _, "0"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7934:     {ok, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7935:     true = (LinkHdr == OrigLinkHdr),
 7936:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7937:     ok = gen_tcp:close(LS),
 7938:     ok.
 7939: 
 7940: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr) ->
 7941:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once},{packet,http}]),
 7942:     receive
 7943:         {http, S, {http_request, 'GET', _, _}} ->
 7944:             ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, undefined)
 7945:     after
 7946:         3000 ->
 7947:             error({timeout,request_line})
 7948:     end.
 7949: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok) ->
 7950:     Resp = "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-length: 0\r\n" ++
 7951:         "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7952:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Resp);
 7953: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State) ->
 7954:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once}, {packet,httph}]),
 7955:     receive
 7956:         {http, S, http_eoh} ->
 7957:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok);
 7958:         {http, S, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} ->
 7959:             LinkHdr = OrigLinkHdr,
 7960:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7961:         {http, S, {http_header, _, _Hdr, _, _Val}} ->
 7962:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7963:         {http, S, {http_error, Err}} ->
 7964:             error({error, Err})
 7965:     after
 7966:         3000 ->
 7967:             error({timeout,header})
 7968:     end.
 7969: 
 7970: wrapping_oct() ->
 7971:     [{timetrap, {minutes,20}}].
 7972: 
 7973: %% Check that 64bit octet counters work.
 7974: wrapping_oct(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7975:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7976:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7977:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7978:                             Addr;
 7979:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7980:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7981:                     end
 7982:            end,
 7983:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) end,
 7984:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7985:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7986: 
 7987: %% {recbuf, 8192}, {sndbuf, 8192}
 7988: do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) ->
 7989:     ?P("[ctrl] create listen socket"),
 7990:     Ctrl = self(),
 7991:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{mode,binary}]),
 7992:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 7993:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn acceptor"),
 7994:     Acceptor = spawn_link(fun() -> oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) end),
 7995:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn pump"),
 7996:     Pump     = spawn_link(fun() -> 
 7997:                                   oct_datapump(Ctrl,
 7998:                                                Config, Addr, LPort, 16#10000FFFF)
 7999:                           end),
 8000:     ?P("[ctrl] await acceptor socket"),
 8001:     ASock = wc_await_socket("acceptor", Acceptor),
 8002:     ?P("[ctrl] await pump socket"),
 8003:     PSock = wc_await_socket("pump", Pump),
 8004:     ?P("[ctrl] await completion (from pump)"),
 8005:     Res = wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock),
 8006:     ?P("[ctrl] close listen socket"),
 8007:     gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 8008:     ?P("[ctrl] verify result"),
 8009:     ok = Res,
 8010:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 8011:     ok.
 8012: 
 8013: wc_await_socket(Tag, Pid) ->
 8014:     receive
 8015:         {Pid, socket, AS} ->
 8016:             ?P("received ~s socket: "
 8017:                "~n      ~p", [Tag, AS]),
 8018:             AS
 8019:     end.
 8020: 
 8021: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock) ->
 8022:     wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, 1, undefined).
 8023: 
 8024: wc_await_completion(undefined = _Acceptor, _ASock,
 8025:                     undefined = _Pump,     _PSock, 
 8026:                     Loops, Res) ->
 8027:     ?P("completed after ~w loops", [Loops]),
 8028:     Res;
 8029: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, Loops, CRes) ->
 8030:     receive
 8031:         {'EXIT', Pump, Res} ->
 8032:             ?P("[ctrl] Received pump exit: "
 8033:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 8034:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 8035:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 8036:                                 undefined, PSock,
 8037:                                 Loops + 1, Res);
 8038:         {'EXIT', Acceptor, Res} ->
 8039:             ?P("[ctrl] Received acceptor exit: "
 8040:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 8041:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 8042:             wc_await_completion(undefined, ASock,
 8043:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 8044:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 8045:                 
 8046:     after 10000 ->
 8047:             ASockInfo = wc_sock_info(ASock),
 8048:             AccInfo   = wc_proc_info(Acceptor),
 8049:             PSockInfo = wc_sock_info(PSock),
 8050:             PumpInfo  = wc_proc_info(Pump),
 8051:             ?P("Info ~w while waiting for clompletion: "
 8052:                "~n   Acceptor Socket Info: ~p"
 8053:                "~n   Acceptor Info:        ~p"
 8054:                "~n   Pump Socket Info:     ~p"
 8055:                "~n   Pump Info:            ~p",
 8056:                [Loops, ASockInfo, AccInfo, PSockInfo, PumpInfo]),
 8057:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 8058:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 8059:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 8060:     end.
 8061:             
 8062: wc_sock_info(S) ->
 8063:     try inet:info(S)
 8064:     catch
 8065:         _:_:_ ->
 8066:             undefined
 8067:     end.
 8068: 
 8069: wc_proc_info(P) when is_pid(P) ->
 8070:     try erlang:process_info(P)
 8071:     catch
 8072:         _:_:_ ->
 8073:             undefined
 8074:     end;
 8075: wc_proc_info(_) ->
 8076:     undefined.
 8077: 
 8078: %% {recbuf, 16*1024}, {sndbuf, 16*1024}
 8079: oct_datapump(Ctrl, Config, Addr, Port, N) ->
 8080:     ?P("[pump] connect to listener"),
 8081:     {ok, CSock} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 8082: 			   [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {mode, binary}]),
 8083:     ?P("[pump] announce to ctrl"),
 8084:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, CSock},
 8085:     {ok, [{sndbuf,SndBuf}]} = inet:getopts(CSock, [sndbuf]),
 8086:     ?P("[pump] connected - start 'pumping' with"
 8087:        "~n      SndBuf: ~w", [SndBuf]),
 8088:     put(action,  nothing),
 8089:     put(sent,    0),
 8090:     put(elapsed, 0),
 8091:     put(rem_bytes, N),
 8092:     oct_pump(CSock, N, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>,100000), 0, 0).
 8093: 
 8094: oct_pump(S, N, _, _, _Sent) when N =< 0 ->
 8095:     ?P("[pump] done"),
 8096:     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8097:     exit(ok);
 8098: oct_pump(S, N, Bin, Last, Sent) ->
 8099:     put(action, send),
 8100:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 8101:     Res     = gen_tcp:send(S, Bin),
 8102:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 8103:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 8104:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 8105:     put(action,  sent),
 8106:     put(sent,    Sent+1),
 8107:     case Res of
 8108: 	ok ->
 8109: 	    case inet:getstat(S) of
 8110: 		{ok, Stat} ->
 8111: 		    {_, R} = lists:keyfind(send_oct, 1, Stat),
 8112: 		    case (R < Last) of
 8113: 			true ->
 8114: 			    ?P("[pump] send counter error ~p < ~p", [R, Last]),
 8115:                             (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8116: 			    exit({error, {output_counter, R, Last, N}});
 8117: 			false ->
 8118:                             put(rem_bytes, N - byte_size(Bin)),
 8119: 			    oct_pump(S, N-byte_size(Bin), Bin, R, Sent+1)
 8120: 		    end;
 8121: 		{error, StatReason} ->
 8122: 		    ?P("[pump] get stat failed:"
 8123: 		       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 8124: 		       "~n   when"
 8125: 		       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 8126: 		       "~n      Last:      ~p", [StatReason, N, Last]),
 8127: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8128: 		    exit({error, {stat_failure, StatReason, N, Last}})
 8129: 	    end;
 8130: 	{error, SendReason} ->
 8131: 	    ?P("[pump] send failed:"
 8132: 	       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 8133: 	       "~n   when"
 8134: 	       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 8135: 	       "~n      Last:      ~p", [SendReason, N, Last]),
 8136: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8137: 	    exit({error, {send_failure, SendReason, N, Last}})
 8138:     end.
 8139:     
 8140: 
 8141: oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) ->
 8142:     ?P("[acceptor] accept connection"),
 8143:     {ok, ASock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 8144:     ?P("[acceptor] announce to ctrl"),
 8145:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, ASock},
 8146:     {ok, [{recbuf,RecBuf}]} = inet:getopts(ASock, [recbuf]),
 8147:     ?P("[acceptor] connection accepted - start receiving with: "
 8148:        "~n      RecBuf: ~w", [RecBuf]),
 8149:     put(action,  nothing),
 8150:     put(recv,    0),
 8151:     put(elapsed, 0),
 8152:     oct_aloop(ASock, inet:info(ASock), 0, 0).
 8153: 
 8154: oct_aloop(S, LastInfo, Received, Times) ->
 8155:     put(action, recv),
 8156:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 8157:     Res     = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 8158:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 8159:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 8160:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 8161:     put(action,  received),
 8162:     put(recv,    Times+1),
 8163:     case Res of
 8164: 	{ok, _} ->
 8165:             #{counters := #{recv_oct := R} = _Stat} = Info = inet:info(S),
 8166:             case (R < Received) of
 8167:                 true ->
 8168:                     ?P("[acceptor] recv counter error:"
 8169:                        "~n      Recv Cnt:  ~p"
 8170:                        "~n      Received:  ~p"
 8171:                        "~n      Times:     ~p"
 8172:                        "~n      Info:      ~p"
 8173:                        "~n      Last Info: ~p",
 8174:                        [R, Received, Times, Info, LastInfo]),
 8175:                     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8176:                     {error, {output_counter, R, Received, Times}};
 8177:                 false ->
 8178:                     case Times rem 16#FFFFF of
 8179:                         0 ->
 8180:                             ?P("[acceptor] read: ~p"
 8181:                                "~n      Times: ~w"
 8182:                                "~n      Info:  ~p",
 8183:                                [R, Times, Info]);
 8184:                         _ ->
 8185:                             ok
 8186:                     end,
 8187:                     oct_aloop(S, Info, R, Times+1)
 8188:             end;
 8189: 
 8190: 	{error, RecvReason} ->
 8191: 	    ?P("[acceptor] receive failed:"
 8192: 	       "~n      Reason:   ~p"
 8193: 	       "~n   when"
 8194: 	       "~n      Received: ~p"
 8195: 	       "~n      Times:    ~p", [RecvReason, Received, Times]),
 8196: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8197:             ct:sleep(1000), % Just give the 'pump' a chance to get there first
 8198: 	    exit(closed)
 8199:     end.
 8200: 
 8201: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 8202:

 8204: %%%     "@"++Host = lists:dropwhile(fun(C) -> C =/= $@ end, atom_to_list(Name)),
 8205: %%%     Host.
